atk-s0516a:84_3: tattha tattha issaṃ uppādento catūsu apāyesu saṃsīdāpeti. Tenāha –
atk-s0516a:84_6: Kodho dhūmoti tava ñāṇaggissa upakkilesaṭṭhena kodho dhūmo.
atk-s0516a:84_7: Tena hi te upakkiliṭṭho ñāṇaggi na virocati.
atk-s0516a:84_8: Bhasmani mosavajjanti nirojaṭṭhena musāvādo chārikā nāma.
atk-s0516a:84_9: Yathā hi chārikāya paṭicchanno aggi na jotati,
atk-s0516a:84_10: evaṃ te musāvādena paṭicchannaṃ ñāṇanti dasseti.
atk-s0516a:84_11: Jivhā sujāti yathā tuyhaṃ suvaṇṇarajatalohakaṭṭhamattikāsu aññataramayā yāgayajanatthāya sujā hoti,
atk-s0516a:84_12: evaṃ mayhaṃ dhammayāgayajanatthāya pahutajivhā sujāti vadati.
atk-s0516a:85_11: Te hi aṇḍakosañca vatthikosañca okkamanti pavisanti okkamantā pavisantā viya paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanti.
atk-s0516a:85_14: Te hi pākaṭā eva hutvā nibbattanti.
atk-s0516a:86_1: Khandhā eva hi paramatthato pātubhavanti, na sattā.
atk-s0516a:86_6: Āyatanānanti ettha tatra tatra upapajjamānāyatanānaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:86_8: Pātubhavantāneva hi tāni paṭiladdhāni nāma honti.
atk-s0516a:86_9: Sā panesā tattha tattha bhave paṭhamābhinibbattilakkhaṇā jāti,
atk-s0516a:87_4: Ayañhi jarāti iminā padena sabhāvato dīpitā.
atk-s0516a:87_10: Valittacatāti iminā maṃsaṃ milāpetvā tace valibhāvakaraṇakiccato.
atk-s0516a:87_11: Tenassā ime khaṇḍiccantiādayo tayo kālātikkame kiccaniddesā.
atk-s0516a:87_12: Tehi imesaṃ vikārānaṃ dassanavasena pākaṭībhūtā pākaṭajarā dassitā.
atk-s0516a:87_13: Yatheva hi udakassa vā vātassa vā aggino vā tiṇarukkhādīnaṃ saṃbhaggapalibhaggatāya vā jhāmatāya vā gatamaggo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0516a:87_14: na ca so gatamaggo tāneva udakādīni,
atk-s0516a:87_15: evameva jarāya dantādīnaṃ khaṇḍiccādivasena gatamaggo pākaṭo,
atk-s0516a:88_0: Āyuno saṃhāni indriyānaṃ paripākoti imehi pana padehi kālātikkameyeva abhibyattāya āyukkhayacakkhādiindriyaparipākasaṅkhātāya pakatiyā dīpitā,
atk-s0516a:88_2: Tattha yasmā jaraṃ pattassa āyu hāyati,
atk-s0516a:88_4: Yasmā ca daharakāle suppasannāni sukhumampi attano visayaṃ sukheneva gaṇhanasamatthāni cakkhādīni indriyāni
atk-s0516a:88_6: oḷārikampi attano visayaṃ gahetuṃ asamatthāni honti.
atk-s0516a:89_0: Sā panesā evaṃ niddiṭṭhā sabbāpi jarā pākaṭā paṭicchannāti duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0516a:89_1: Tattha dantādīsu khaṇḍādibhāvadassanato rūpadhammesu jarā pākaṭajarā nāma.
atk-s0516a:89_2: Arūpadhammesu pana jarā tādisassa vikārassa adassanato paṭicchannajarā nāma.
atk-s0516a:89_5: Tañca cakkhunā disvā manodvārena cintetvā “ime dantā jarāya pahaṭā”ti jaraṃ jānāti.
atk-s0516a:89_6: Udakaṭṭhāne baddhāni gosiṅgādīni oloketvā heṭṭhā udakassa atthibhāvajānanaṃ viya.
atk-s0516a:90_0: Puna avīci savīcīti evampi ayaṃ jarā duvidhā hoti.
atk-s0516a:90_1: Tattha maṇikanakarajatapavāḷacandasūriyādīnaṃ mandadasakādīsu pāṇīnaṃ viya ca pupphaphalapallavādīsu
atk-s0516a:90_2: apāṇīnaṃ viya ca antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ dubbiññeyyattā jarā avīcijarā nāma,
atk-s0516a:90_4: Tato aññesu pana yathāvuttesu antarantarā vaṇṇavisesādīnaṃ suviññeyyattā jarā savīcijarā nāma.
atk-s0516a:91_3: Tesu pana patitesu puna dantā uṭṭhahanti,
atk-s0516a:91_6: Kesā pana paṭhamameva tambāpi honti kāḷakāpi setakāpi.
atk-s0516a:91_19: Evaṃ bhagavā idampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi,
atk-s0516a:91_20: desanāpariyosāne ayampi brāhmaṇo arahatte patiṭṭhāsi saddhiṃ antevāsikasahassena.
atk-s0516a:95_2: maññāmi taṃ vedagū bhāvitattanti “ayaṃ vedagū”ti ca “bhāvitatto”ti ca evaṃ taṃ maññāmi.
atk-s0516a:96_5: Bahuratano sāgarūpamoti bahūnaṃ dhammaratanānaṃ ākarattā anekavidharatanasampanno mahāsamuddo viya bahuratano sāgarasadiso.
atk-s0516a:97_0: Na maṅku hotīti na vikuṇitamukho hoti.
atk-s0516a:98_0: Diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattoti cakkhuvisaye rūpārammaṇe diṭṭhamattoyeva taṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0516a:99_0: Saṃvijjati bhagavato cakkhūti buddhassa bhagavato pakatimaṃsacakkhu upalabbhati.
atk-s0516a:100_0: Dantaṃ nayanti samitinti uyyānakīḷāmaṇḍalādīsu hi mahājanamajjhaṃ gacchantā dantameva goṇaṃ vā dantaṃ assājānīyaṃ vā yāne yojetvā nayanti.
atk-s0516a:100_1: Rājāti tathārūpāneva ṭhānāni gacchanto rājāpi dantameva abhiruhati.
atk-s0516a:100_2: Manussesūti manussesupi catūhi ariyamaggehi danto nibbisevanova seṭṭho.
atk-s0516a:100_3: Yotivākyanti evarūpaṃ atikkammavacanaṃ punappunaṃ vuccamānampi titikkhati nappatippharati na vihaññati,
atk-s0516a:101_5: Attadantoti ete assatarā vā sindhavā vā kuñjarā vā dantāva,
atk-s0516a:101_7: Yo pana catumaggasaṅkhātena attano dantatāya attadanto nibbisevano,
atk-s0516a:102_0: Na hi etehi yānehīti yāni etāni hatthiyānādīni uttamayānāni,
atk-s0516a:102_1: etehi yānehi koci puggalo supinantenapi agatapubbattā “agata”nti saṅkhātaṃ nibbānadisaṃ tathā na gaccheyya.
atk-s0516a:102_3: aparabhāge ariyamaggabhāvanāya sudantena danto nibbisevano sappañño puggalo taṃ agatapubbaṃ disaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0516a:103_0: Vidhāsu na vikampantīti navavidhamānakoṭṭhāsesu na calanti na vedhenti.
atk-s0516a:103_1: Vippamuttā punabbhavāti kammakilesato samucchedavimuttiyā suṭṭhu muttā.
atk-s0516a:103_3: Te loke vijitāvinoti te vuttappakārā khīṇāsavā sattaloke vijitavijayā nāma.
atk-s0516a:104_0: Yassindriyāni bhāvitānīti yassa khīṇāsavassa saddhādipañcindriyāni arahattaphalaṃ pāpetvā vaḍḍhitāni.
atk-s0516a:104_1: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā cāti cakkhādiajjhattāyatanāni ca rūpādibahiddhāyatanāni ca nibbisevanāni katāni.
atk-s0516a:104_3: Nibbijjha imaṃ parañca lokanti imañca attabhāvaṃ paraloke ca attabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo.
atk-s0516a:104_4: Kālaṃ kaṅkhati bhāvito sa dantoti so khīṇāsavo cakkhādito danto vaḍḍhitacitto maraṇakālaṃ pattheti.
atk-s0516a:105_0: Yesaṃ dhammānaṃ ādito samudāgamanaṃ paññāyatīti yesaṃ khandhādidhammānaṃ uppatti paññāyati.
atk-s0516a:105_1: Atthaṅgamato nirodhoti atthaṅgamanavasena tesaṃyeva abhāvo paññāyati.
atk-s0516a:105_2: Kammasannissito vipākoti kusalākusalakammanissito vipāko kammaṃ amuñcitvā pavattanato vipākopi kammasannissitova nāma.
atk-s0516a:105_3: Nāmasannissitaṃ rūpanti sabbarūpaṃ nāmaṃ gahetvā pavattanato nāmasannissitaṃ nāma jātaṃ.
atk-s0516a:105_4: Jātiyā anugatanti sabbaṃ kammādikaṃ jātiyā anupaviṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:105_8: Atāṇanti puttādīhipi tāyanassa abhāvato atāyanaṃ anārakkhaṃ alabbhaṇeyyaṃ khemaṃ vā.
atk-s0516a:105_13: Asaraṇībhūtanti pure uppattiyā attano abhāveneva asaraṇaṃ,
atk-s0516a:106_4: Pavakkhāmi yathā pajānanti yathā pajānanto ācikkhati,
atk-s0516a:106_6: Upadhinidānā pabhavanti dukkhāti taṇhādiupadhinidānā jātiādidukkhavisesā pabhavanti.
atk-s0516a:107_7: Kammasamuṭṭhānā kammeneva gahitā pathavādayo catasso dhātuyova catasso upādinnadhātuyo upadhī.
atk-s0516a:107_8: Cakkhādichaajjhattikāni āyatanāni eva cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni upadhī.
atk-s0516a:107_10: Sabbampi dukkhaṃ dukkhamanaṭṭhenāti sabbatebhūmakaṃ dukkhaṃ dussahanaṭṭhena upadhi.
atk-s0516a:109_2: Tathā hi te vidito esa dhammoti yathā yathā sattā jānanti,
atk-s0516a:109_3: tathā tathā ñāpanavasena vidito esa tayā dhammoti.
atk-s0516a:110_1: Uttarantīti dutiyamaggena kāmoghaṃ tanukaraṇavasena uggantvā taranti.
atk-s0516a:110_2: Patarantīti tameva niravasesappahānavasena tatiyamaggena visesena taranti.
atk-s0516a:111_1: Kittayissāmi te dhammanti nibbānadhammaṃ nibbānagāminipaṭipadādhammañca te desayissāmi.
atk-s0516a:111_5: Yaṃ viditvāti yaṃ dhammaṃ “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”tiādinā nayena sammasanto viditvā.
atk-s0516a:112_0: Tattha ādikalyāṇanti hitvāpi anuttaraṃ vivekasukhaṃ dhammaṃ tava kittayissāmi,
atk-s0516a:112_1: tañca kho appaṃ vā bahuṃ vā kittayanto ādikalyāṇādippakārameva kittayissāmi.
atk-s0516a:112_2: Ādimhi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kittayissāmi. Majjhepi.
atk-s0516a:112_3: Pariyosānepi bhaddakaṃ anavajjameva katvā kittayissāmīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:113_1: veneyyānaṃ anurūpato atthassa aviparītatāya ca hetudāharaṇayuttato ca majjhekalyāṇaṃ,
atk-s0516a:114_0: Sakalo hi sāsanadhammo attano atthabhūtena sīlena ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0516a:114_9: Taṃ sutvā tathattāya paṭipannena adhigantabbāya abhisambodhiyā vā ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0516a:115_0: Suyyamāno cesa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanato bhavanenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0516a:115_1: paṭipajjiyamāno samathavipassanāsukhāvahanato paṭipattiyāpi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti majjhekalyāṇo,
atk-s0516a:115_2: tathāpaṭipanno ca paṭipattiphale niṭṭhite tādibhāvāvahanato paṭipattiphalenapi kalyāṇameva āvahatīti pariyosānakalyāṇoti.
atk-s0516a:116_0: Yaṃ panesa bhagavā dhammaṃ desento sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ maggabrahmacariyañca pakāseti,
atk-s0516a:117_4: Nirupakkilesato nittharaṇatthāya pavattito lokāmisanirapekkhato ca parisuddhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:118_0: Evaṃ pariyattidhammaṃ dassetvā idāni lokuttaradhammaṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhāne”ti āha.
atk-s0516a:119_0: Dukkhe diṭṭheti dukkhasacce sarasalakkhaṇena diṭṭhe dukkhasaccaṃ pakāsessāmi.
atk-s0516a:120_1: Tañcāhaṃ abhinandāmīti taṃ vuttappakāradhammajotakaṃ tava vacanaṃ ahaṃ patthayāmi.
atk-s0516a:121_0: Tattha mahato tamokāyassa padālananti mahato avijjārāsissa chedanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:121_4: Mahato vipallāsassa pabhedananti mahantassa asubhe subhantiādidvādasavidhassa vipallāsassa bhedanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:121_5: Mahato taṇhāsallassa abbahananti mahantassa antotudanaṭṭhena taṇhākaṇṭakassa luñcanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:121_6: Diṭṭhisaṅghāṭassa viniveṭhananti diṭṭhiyeva abbocchinnappavattito saṅghaṭitaṭṭhena saṅghāṭo,
atk-s0516a:121_8: Mānadhajassa pātananti ussitaṭṭhena unnatilakkhaṇassa mānaddhajassa pātanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:121_10: Oghassa nittharaṇanti vaṭṭe osīdāpanassa kāmoghādioghassa nittharaṇaṃ nikkhamanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:123_1: Uddhaṃ adho tiriyañcāpi majjheti ettha uddhanti anāgataddhā vuccati.
atk-s0516a:123_5: panujja viññāṇanti etesu uddhādīsu taṇhañca diṭṭhinivesanañca abhisaṅkhāraviññāṇañca panudehi.
atk-s0516a:123_6: Panuditvā ca bhave na tiṭṭheti evaṃ sante duvidhepi bhave na tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0516a:123_7: Evaṃ tāva panujjasaddassa panudehīti imasmiṃ atthavikappe sambandho.
atk-s0516a:123_8: Panuditvāti etasmiṃ pana atthavikappe bhave na tiṭṭheti ayameva sambandho.
atk-s0516a:123_9: Etāni nandīnivesanaviññāṇāni panuditvā duvidhepi bhave na tiṭṭheyyāti.
atk-s0516a:124_3: Tattha kusalā dhammāti apāyaṃ muñcitvā upari paṭisandhidānato kusalā dhammā uddhanti vuccanti.
atk-s0516a:124_5: Tadubhayavimuttattā abyākatā dhammā tiriyañcāpi majjheti vuccanti.
atk-s0516a:126_6: Kammabhave na tiṭṭheyyāti puññādiabhisaṅkhāre na tiṭṭheyya.
atk-s0516a:129_0: Niddese kilesā cāti upatāpanaṭṭhena rāgādayo kilesā ca rāsaṭṭhena vipākabhūtā pañcakkhandhā ca kusalādiabhisaṅkhārā
atk-s0516a:130_4: Taṃ taṃ namassāmīti tasmā taṃ namassāmi.
atk-s0516a:131_6: Āguṃ na karotīti pāpaṃ na karoti.
atk-s0516a:132_1: Idāni naṃ bhagavā “addhā hi bhagavā pahāsi dukkha”nti evaṃ tena brāhmaṇena viditopi attānaṃ anupanetvāva
atk-s0516a:132_7: kāmesu ca bhavesu ca asattattā kāmabhave asatto”ti jaññā jāneyyāsi.
atk-s0516a:135_3: Evaṃ bhagavā idampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi.
atk-s0516a:135_4: Desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0516a:139_3: Sikkhe nibbānamattanoti attano rāgādīnaṃ nibbānatthāya adhisīlādīni sikkheyya.
atk-s0516a:143_1: Evaṃ vutte attamano dhotako bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamāno kathaṃkathāpamokkhaṃ yācanto “passāmaha”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:143_2: Tattha passāmahaṃ devamanussaloketi passāmi ahaṃ devamanussaloke.
atk-s0516a:143_3: Taṃ taṃ namassāmīti taṃ evarūpaṃ taṃ namassāmi.
atk-s0516a:144_0: Niddese paccekabuddhāti taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ pāṭiyekkaṃ catusaccaṃ sayameva buddhā paṭivedhappattāti paccekabuddhā.
atk-s0516a:144_10: Pamocehi manti atīva sithilaṃ karohi maṃ.
atk-s0516a:144_11: Uddhara manti maṃ saṃsārapaṅkā uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpehi.
atk-s0516a:144_12: Samuddhara manti sammā uddharitvā thale patiṭṭhāpehi maṃ.
atk-s0516a:144_13: Vuṭṭhāpehīti vicikicchāsallato apanetvā visuṃ karaṇavasena uṭṭhāpehi.
atk-s0516a:145_1: Athassa bhagavā attādhīnameva kathaṃkathāpamokkhaṃ oghataraṇamukhena dassento “nāha”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:145_2: Tattha nāhaṃ sahissāmīti ahaṃ na sahissāmi na sakkomi.
atk-s0516a:146_0: Niddese na īhāmīti payogaṃ na karomi.
atk-s0516a:146_1: Na samīhāmīti atīva payogaṃ na karomi.
atk-s0516a:147_1: Evaṃ vutte attamanataro dhotako bhagavantaṃ abhitthavamāno anusāsaniṃ yācanto “anusāsa brahme”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:148_1: Ito parā dve gāthā mettagūsutte vuttanayā eva.
atk-s0516a:149_0: Evaṃ bhagavā idampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi,
atk-s0516a:149_1: desanāpariyosāne ca vuttasadiso eva dhammābhisamayo ahosīti.
atk-s0516a:153_3: Anissitoti puggalaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā anallīno.
atk-s0516a:153_6: Yaṃ nissitoti yaṃ dhammaṃ vā puggalaṃ vā nissito.
atk-s0516a:155_1: Idāni yasmā brāhmaṇo ākiñcaññāyatanalābhī tañca santampi nissayaṃ na jānāti.
atk-s0516a:155_2: Tenassa bhagavā tañca nissayaṃ uttariñca niyyānapathaṃ dassento “ākiñcañña”nti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:155_3: Tattha pekkhamānoti taṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpattiṃ sato samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhahitvā ca aniccādivasena passamāno.
atk-s0516a:155_4: Natthīti nissāyāti taṃ “natthi kiñcī”ti pavattaṃ samāpattiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā.
atk-s0516a:155_5: Tarassu oghanti tato pabhuti pavattāya vipassanāya yathānurūpaṃ catubbidhampi oghaṃ tarassu.
atk-s0516a:155_7: Taṇhakkhayaṃ nattamahābhipassāti rattindivaṃ nibbānaṃ vibhūtaṃ katvā passa.
atk-s0516a:156_0: Niddese taññeva viññāṇaṃ abhāvetīti ākāsālambaṇaṃ katvā pavattamahaggataviññāṇaṃ abhāveti abhāvaṃ gameti.
atk-s0516a:156_3: Natthi kiñcīti passatīti antamaso bhaṅgamattampissa natthīti passati.
atk-s0516a:157_1: Idāni “kāme pahāyā”ti sutvā vikkhambhanavasena attanā pahīne kāme sampassamāno “sabbesū”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:157_2: Tattha hitvā maññanti aññaṃ tato heṭṭhā chabbidhampi samāpattiṃ hitvā.
atk-s0516a:157_3: Saññāvimokkhe parameti sattasu saññāvimokkhesu uttame ākiñcaññāyatane.
atk-s0516a:157_4: Tiṭṭhe nu so tattha anānuyāyīti so puggalo tattha ākiñcaññāyatanabrahmaloke avigacchamāno tiṭṭheyya nūti pucchati.
atk-s0516a:159_1: Athassa bhagavā saṭṭhikappasahassamattakaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ anujānanto catutthaṃ gāthamāha.

atk-s0516a:334_3: Tasmā idha rūpe saññā rūpasaññāti evaṃ saññāsīsena rūpāvacarajhānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:334_6: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ adhivacananti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:334_7: Idha pana kusalavipākakiriyavasena pañcadasajhānasaṅkhātā rūpasaññā eva adhippetā.
atk-s0516a:334_9: Upapannassa vāti vipākajjhānavasena tasmiṃ bhave upapannassa.
atk-s0516a:334_10: Diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārissa vāti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve kiriyājhānaṃ samāpajjitvā sukhaṃ uppādetvā viharantassa.

atk-s0516a:340_2: Aparimāṇesupi hi cakkavāḷesu aparimāṇānaṃ manussānaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena dvepi ekasadisā natthi.

atk-s0516a:348_1: Yasmā pana ārammaṇasamatikkamena pattabbā etā samāpattiyo,

atk-s0516a:388_13: Anantarāya teheva sesānaṃ upanissayeneva paccayo hoti.
atk-s0516a:389_0: Avasiyapavattasallakkhaṇavasena vāti avaso hutvā pavattasaṅkhāre passanavasena olokanavasenāti attho.
atk-s0516a:389_1: Rūpe vaso na labbhatīti rūpasmiṃ vasavattibhāvo issarabhāvo na labbhati.
atk-s0516a:390_2: kāyo tumhākanti attani sati attaniyaṃ nāma hoti,
atk-s0516a:390_7: Nāpi aññesanti añño nāma paresaṃ attā.
atk-s0516a:391_0: Rūpe sāro na labbhatīti rūpasmiṃ niccādisāro na labbhati.
atk-s0516a:391_2: Rūpaṃ assāraṃ nissāranti rūpaṃ assāraṃ sāravirahitañca.
atk-s0516a:391_4: Niccasārasārena vāti bhaṅgaṃ atikkamitvā pavattamānena niccasārena vā.
atk-s0516a:391_5: Kassaci niccasārassa abhāvato niccasārena sāro natthi.
atk-s0516a:391_6: Sukhasārasārena vāti ṭhitisukhaṃ atikkamitvā pavattamānassa kassaci sukhasārassa abhāvato sukhasārasārena vā.
atk-s0516a:391_8: Niccena vāti bhaṅgaṃ atikkamitvā pavattamānassa kassaci niccassa abhāvato niccena vā.
atk-s0516a:391_9: Dhuvena vāti vijjamānakālepi paccayāyattavuttitāya thirassa kassaci abhāvato dhuvena vā.
atk-s0516a:391_10: Sassatena vāti abbocchinnassa sabbakāle vijjamānassa kassaci abhāvato sassatena vā.
atk-s0516a:391_11: Avipariṇāmadhammena vāti jarābhaṅgavasena avipariṇāmapakatikassa kassaci abhāvato avipariṇāmadhammena vā.
atk-s0516a:392_0: Cakkhu suññaṃ attena vā attaniyena vāti “kārako vedako sayaṃvasī”ti evaṃ parikappikena attanā vā attābhāvatoyeva
atk-s0516a:392_2: Sabbaṃ cakkhādilokiyadhammajātaṃ yasmā attā ca ettha natthi,
atk-s0516a:392_7: Tasmiṃ dhamme attattaniyasārassa natthibhāvo vutto hoti.
atk-s0516a:392_8: Loke ca “suññaṃ gharaṃ suñño ghaṭo”ti vutto gharassa ghaṭassa ca natthibhāvo na hoti,
atk-s0516a:392_9: tasmiṃ ghaṭe ca aññassa natthibhāvo vutto hoti.
atk-s0516a:392_10: Bhagavatā ca iti yampi koci tattha na hoti,
atk-s0516a:392_13: taṃ santaṃ idamatthīti pajānātīti ayamevattho vutto.
atk-s0516a:393_0: Suddhanti kevalaṃ issarakālapakatīhi vinā kevalaṃ paccayāyattapavattivasena pavattamānaṃ suddhaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:393_3: suddhaṃ saṅkhārasantatinti suddhaṃ passantassa jānantassa saṅkhārānaṃ santatiṃ abbocchinnasaṅkhārasantatiṃ.
atk-s0516a:393_6: Evaṃ passantassa maraṇamukhe bhayaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0516a:393_10: Yathā araññe tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu gaṇhantesu attānaṃ vā attaniyaṃ vā gaṇhātīti na hoti,
atk-s0516a:393_11: tesu vā tiṇakaṭṭhādīsu sayameva nassantesupi vinassantesupi attā nassati,
atk-s0516a:393_13: Evaṃ imasmiṃ kāyepi nassante vā vinassante vā attā vā attaniyaṃ vā bhijjatīti apassanto paññāya tiṇakaṭṭhasamaṃ passatīti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:393_15: aññatrappaṭisandhiyāti paṭisandhivirahitaṃ nibbānaṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ bhavaṃ vā attabhāvaṃ vā na pattheti.
atk-s0516a:394_4: Tampi tassa na hotīti taṃ tividhampi tassa puggalassa na hoti.
atk-s0516a:395_1: svāyaṃ katthaci lokaṃ upādāya vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:397_0: Punarāyu ca me laddho, evaṃ jānāhi mārisā”ti. ;
atk-s0516a:398_3: Idha pana lokaṃ upādāya vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:398_4: Assutavā puthujjanoti ettha pana āgamādhigamābhāvā ñeyyo “assutavā”iti.
atk-s0516a:398_5: Yassa hi khandhadhātuāyatanapaccayākārasatipaṭṭhānādīsu uggahaparipucchāvinicchayarahitattā diṭṭhipaṭisedhako neva āgamo,
atk-s0516a:398_6: paṭipattiyā adhigantabbassa anadhigatattā neva adhigamo atthi,
atk-s0516a:401_0: So hi puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādīhipi kāraṇehi puthujjano. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:401_9: puthu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā muñchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0516a:401_10: puthu pañcahi nīvaraṇehi āvuṭā nivuṭā ovuṭā pihitā paṭicchannā paṭikujjitāti puthujjanā,
atk-s0516a:401_11: puthūnaṃ vā gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjanā,
atk-s0516a:401_14: Evametehi “assutavā puthujjano”ti dvīhi padehi ye te –
atk-s0516a:404_0: Dve puthujjanā vuttā, tesu andhaputhujjano vutto hotīti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:405_3: sadevakena ca lokena araṇīyato buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca buddhasāvakā ca vuccanti,
atk-s0516a:405_4: buddhā eva vā idha ariyā. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:406_0: Sappurisāti ettha pana paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā ca “sappurisā”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:406_1: Te hi lokuttaraguṇayogena sobhanā purisāti sappurisā.
atk-s0516a:406_3: Buddhāpi hi ariyā ca sappurisā ca paccekabuddhāpi buddhasāvakāpi. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:407_0: “Yo ve kataññū katavedi dhīro, kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hoti;
atk-s0516a:408_0: Dukhitassa sakkacca karoti kiccaṃ, tathāvidhaṃ sappurisaṃ vadantī”ti. ;
atk-s0516a:409_0: “Kalyāṇamitto daḷhabhatti ca hotī”ti ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto.
atk-s0516a:409_8: Maṃsacakkhunā hi dibbacakkhunā vā ariyā diṭṭhāpi adiṭṭhāva honti tesaṃ cakkhunā vaṇṇamattagahaṇato,
atk-s0516a:410_1: cittalapabbatavāsino kira khīṇāsavattherassa upaṭṭhāko vuḍḍhapabbajito ekadivasaṃ therena saddhiṃ piṇḍāya
atk-s0516a:410_2: caritvā therassa pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito āgacchanto theraṃ pucchi –
atk-s0516a:410_6: “idhekacco mahallako ariyānaṃ pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā vattapaṭipattiṃ katvā saha carantopi neva ariye jānāti,
atk-s0516a:410_10: ñāṇena dassanameva dassanaṃ. Yathāha – “alaṃ te, vakkali,
atk-s0516a:410_11: kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali,
atk-s0516a:410_14: Tasmā cakkhunā passantopi ñāṇena ariyehi diṭṭhaṃ aniccādilakkhaṇaṃ apassanto,
atk-s0516a:410_16: ariyakaradhammānaṃ ariyabhāvassa ca adiṭṭhattā “ariyānaṃ adassāvī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:411_0: Ariyadhammassa akovidoti satipaṭṭhānādibhede ariyadhamme akusalo. Ariyadhamme avinītoti ettha pana –
atk-s0516a:414_1: Ettha ca duvidhepi vinaye ekamekopi vinayo pañcadhā bhijjati.
atk-s0516a:414_2: Saṃvaravinayopi hi sīlasaṃvaro satisaṃvaro ñāṇasaṃvaro khantisaṃvaro vīriyasaṃvaroti pañcavidho.
atk-s0516a:414_3: Pahānavinayopi tadaṅgappahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ samucchedappahānaṃ paṭippassaddhippahānaṃ nissaraṇappahānanti pañcavidho.
atk-s0516a:415_0: Tattha “iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto hoti samupeto”ti ayaṃ sīlasaṃvaro.
atk-s0516a:419_3: Sabbopi cāyaṃ saṃvaro yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ saṃvaraṇato “saṃvaro”,
atk-s0516a:419_5: Evaṃ tāva saṃvaravinayo pañcadhā bhijjatīti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:420_0: Tathā yaṃ nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesu paṭipakkhabhāvato dīpālokeneva tamassa,
atk-s0516a:420_1: tena tena vipassanāñāṇena tassa tassa anatthassa pahānaṃ.
atk-s0516a:421_0: Yaṃ pana upacārappanābhedena samādhinā pavattibhāvanivāraṇato ghaṭappahāreneva udakapiṭṭhe sevālassa tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ pahānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:421_2: Yaṃ catunnaṃ ariyamaggānaṃ bhāvitattā taṃtaṃmaggavato attano attano santāne “diṭṭhigatānaṃ pahānāyā”tiādinā
atk-s0516a:421_3: nayena vuttassa samudayapakkhiyassa kilesagaṇassa accantaappavattibhāvena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:421_9: Sabbampi cetaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:421_12: Taṃ taṃ pahānavato vā tassa tassa vinayassa sambhavatopetaṃ “pahānavinayo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:422_0: Evamayaṃ saṅkhepato duvidho bhedato ca dasavidho vinayo bhinnasaṃvarattā,
atk-s0516a:422_1: pahātabbassa ca appahīnattā yasmā etassa assutavato puthujjanassa natthi,
atk-s0516a:422_3: Eseva nayo sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido,
atk-s0516a:422_23: sappurisavinayeti vā esese eke ekaṭṭhe same samabhāge tajjāte taññevāti.
atk-s0516a:423_0: Rūpaṃ attato samanupassatīti idhekacco rūpaṃ attato samanupassati,
atk-s0516a:423_2: taṃ rūpa”nti rūpañca attānañca advayaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0516a:423_3: Seyyathāpi telappadīpassa jhāyato “yā acci, so vaṇṇo. Yo vaṇṇo,
atk-s0516a:423_4: sā accī”ti acciñca vaṇṇañca advayaṃ samanupassati,
atk-s0516a:423_7: Rūpavantaṃ vā attānanti arūpaṃ “attā”ti gahetvā chāyāvantaṃ rukkhaṃ viya taṃ rūpavantaṃ “attā”ti samanupassati.
atk-s0516a:423_8: Attani vā rūpanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā pupphasmiṃ gandhaṃ viya attani rūpaṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0516a:423_9: Rūpasmiṃ vā attānanti arūpameva “attā”ti gahetvā karaṇḍake maṇiṃ viya taṃ attānaṃ rūpasmiṃ samanupassati.
atk-s0516a:424_5: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti imesu sattasu ṭhānesu arūpaṃ “attā”ti kathitaṃ,
atk-s0516a:424_8: vedanāya vā attāna”nti evaṃ catūsu khandhesu tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena dvādasasu ṭhānesu rūpārūpamissako attā kathito.
atk-s0516a:424_9: Tattha rūpaṃ attato samanupassati. Vedanaṃ… saññaṃ… saṅkhāre…
atk-s0516a:424_10: viññāṇaṃ attato samanupassatīti pañcasu ṭhānesu ucchedadiṭṭhi kathitā.
atk-s0516a:424_12: Evamettha pannarasa bhavadiṭṭhiyo pañca vibhavadiṭṭhiyo honti.
atk-s0516a:425_5: Antamakāsi māranti kilesamāraṃ vā devaputtamāraṃ vā antaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0516a:425_7: Māracakkhuṃ adassanaṃ gatoti mārassa adassanavisayaṃ patto.
atk-s0516a:426_0: Evaṃ bhagavā idampi suttaṃ arahattanikūṭeneva desesi,
atk-s0516a:430_2: jiṇṇohamasmi abalo vītavaṇṇoti so kira brāhmaṇo jarābhibhūto vīsavassasatiko jātiyā,
atk-s0516a:430_3: dubbalo ca “idha pādaṃ karissāmī”ti aññatreva karoti,
atk-s0516a:430_6: Māhaṃ nassaṃ momuho antarāvāti māhaṃ tuyhaṃ dhammaṃ asacchikatvā antarā eva avidvā hutvā anassiṃ.
atk-s0516a:430_7: Jātijarāya idha vippahānanti idheva tava pādamūle pāsāṇake cetiye vā jātijarāya vippahānaṃ nibbānaṃ dhammarasaṃ ahaṃ vijaññaṃ,
atk-s0516a:431_7: Yā sā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhāti yā sā subhā sundarā purimakāle sati,
atk-s0516a:431_10: “Yā sā purimā subhā vaṇṇanibhā”ti pāṭhaṃ ṭhapetvā “yā subhā assā”ti eke vaṇṇayanti.
atk-s0516a:432_4: No tathā cakkhunā rūpe passāmīti yathā porāṇacakkhunā rūpārammaṇaṃ passāmi olokemi,
atk-s0516a:432_5: tathā tena pakārena idāni na passāmi.
atk-s0516a:433_2: Tenassa bhagavā kāye sinehappahānatthaṃ “disvāna rūpesu vihaññamāne”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:433_5: Ruppanti rūpesūti cakkhurogādīhi ca rūpahetuyeva janā ruppanti bādhiyanti.
atk-s0516a:435_2: tāva kathitaṃ paṭipattiṃ sutvā piṅgiyo jarādubbalatāya visesaṃ anadhigantvā ca puna “disā catasso”ti
atk-s0516a:435_3: imāya gāthāya bhagavantaṃ thomento desanaṃ yācati.
atk-s0516a:436_0: 92. Athassa bhagavā punapi yāva arahattaṃ, tāva paṭipadaṃ dassento “taṇhādhipanne”ti gāthamāha.
atk-s0516a:439_10: sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhammanti vipassanāvasena evaṃ pavattassa dhammacakkhuṃ udapādīti attho.
atk-s0516a:440_0: Evaṃ idampi suttaṃ bhagavā arahattanikūṭeneva desesi,
atk-s0516a:440_3: “evaṃ vicitrapaṭibhānaṃ nāma desanaṃ na labhati mayhaṃ mātulo bāvarī savanāyā”ti.

atk-s0516a:444_3: Paricārakasoḷasānanti bāvarissa paricārakena piṅgiyena saha soḷasānaṃ,

atk-s0516a:444_5: Te eva ca brāhmaṇā tattha soḷasasu disāsu purato ca pacchato ca vāmapassato ca dakkhiṇapassato ca cha
atk-s0516a:444_6: cha yojanā nisinnā ujukena dvādasayojanikā ahosi.

atk-s0516a:448_10: Atakkāvacareti takkena na avacaritabbe na ogāhitabbe ñāṇeneva avacaritabbe.
atk-s0516a:451_0: 101. Tasmā pārāyananti tassa pārabhūtassa nibbānassa āyatananti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:455_2: bhagavatā hi pārāyane desite soḷasasahassajaṭilā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu,
atk-s0516a:458_0: Niṭṭhitāya pana dhammadesanāya tato tato āgatā manussā bhagavato ānubhāvena attano attano gāmanigamādīsveva pāturahesuṃ.
atk-s0516a:458_1: Bhagavāpi sāvatthimeva agamāsi paricārakasoḷasādīhi anekehi bhikkhusahassehi parivuto.
atk-s0516a:458_6: Atha bhagavatā anuññāto ñāṇagamaneneva godhāvarītīraṃ gantvā pādagamanena assamābhimukho agamāsi.
atk-s0516a:458_7: Tamenaṃ bāvarī brāhmaṇo maggaṃ olokento nisinno dūratova taṃ khārijaṭādivirahitaṃ bhikkhuvesenāgacchantaṃ
atk-s0516a:458_11: pāsāṇake cetiye nisinno amhākaṃ dhammaṃ desesi,
atk-s0516a:458_13: Tato bāvarī mahatā sakkārena sapariso taṃ pūjetvā āsanaṃ paññāpesi.

atk-s0516a:462_0: 104. Saccavhayoti buddho hi sacceneva avhānena nāmena yutto. Brahmeti taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ālapati.
atk-s0516a:463_4: Bhavaloko ca sambhavaloko cāti ettha ekeko dve dve hoti.
atk-s0516a:463_8: So hi iṭṭhaphalattā sundaro lokoti sampatti,
atk-s0516a:464_1: So hi aniṭṭhaphalattā virūpo lokoti vipatti,
atk-s0516a:464_13: Paccayā hi attano phalaṃ āharantīti āhārā.
atk-s0516a:464_19: Cakkhusamphassādiko chabbidho phasso tisso vedanā āharatīti āhāro.
atk-s0516a:464_20: Manaso sañcetanā na sattassāti manosañcetanā yathā cittekaggatā,
atk-s0516a:464_21: manasā vā sampayuttā sañcetanā manosañcetanā yathā ājaññaratho,
atk-s0516a:464_23: Sā hi tayo bhave āharatīti āhāro.
atk-s0516a:465_2: Upādānasambhūtā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā yathā tiṇaggi, thusaggi.
atk-s0516a:465_3: Upādānavidheyyā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā yathā rājapuriso.
atk-s0516a:465_4: Upādānappabhavā vā khandhā upādānakkhandhā yathā puppharukkho,
atk-s0516a:465_6: Upādānāni pana kāmupādānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ sīlabbatupādānaṃ attavādupādānanti cattāri.
atk-s0516a:465_20: Tathā aṭṭha lokadhammā. Api ca – lābho, alābho, yaso, ayaso, nindā, pasaṃsā, sukhaṃ,
atk-s0516a:465_21: dukkhanti ime aṭṭha lokappavattiyā sati anuparivattanadhammakattā lokassa dhammāti lokadhammā.
atk-s0516a:466_9: loko ca ime aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatī”ti.
atk-s0516a:467_4: Soyeva alabbhamāno lābho alābho na lābho alābhoti vuccati,
atk-s0516a:467_15: Tāni pana tathā pakāsitā khandhā eva.
atk-s0516a:467_16: Sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu asaññasattena ca nevasaññānāsaññāyatanena ca saddhiṃ nava sattāvāsā.
atk-s0516a:467_33: manoviññāṇadhātūti ekekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi katvā aṭṭhārasa dhātuyo.
atk-s0516a:469_0: Āsitoti upasaṅkamito. Upāsitoti upagantvā sevito. Payirupāsitoti bhattivasena atīva sevito.
atk-s0516a:471_20: Aṭṭhaparisapathaviṃ uppīḷetvā sadevake loke kenaci paccatthikena paccāmittena akampiye acalaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhanaṭṭhena purisanisabhaṃ.
atk-s0516a:472_0: Mānasakaṃ vā saranti manasā cintetvā kataṃ pallaṃ vā nāmameva vā.

atk-s0516a:538_8: uppannañca vayaṃ upetī”ti iminā ākārena sammasanapaññāya lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ udayabbayānupassanaṃ
atk-s0516a:539_0: Athassa āraddhavipassakassa kulaputtassa obhāso ñāṇaṃ pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0516a:539_2: Ettha obhāso nāma vipassanakkhaṇe ñāṇassa balavattā lohitaṃ sannisīdati,
atk-s0516a:539_4: Taṃ disvā akusalo yogī “maggo me patto”ti tameva obhāsaṃ assādeti.
atk-s0516a:539_6: Taṃ saṅkhāre sammasantassa suddhaṃ pasannaṃ hutvā pavattati.
atk-s0516a:539_9: Tassa hi tasmiṃ khaṇe pañcavidhā pīti uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:539_18: Tassa kira tasmiṃ samaye sakalasarīraṃ abhisandayamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ sukhaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:540_1: Tasmiñhi khaṇe cittacetasikānaṃ ativiya pasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:540_3: Tasmiñhi khaṇe asithilaṃ anaccāraddhaṃ supaggahitaṃ vīriyaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:540_7: Tasmiñhi khaṇe sabbasaṅkhāragahaṇe majjhattabhūtaṃ vipassanupekkhāsaṅkhātaṃ ñāṇaṃ balavantaṃ hutvā uppajjati manodvārāvajjanupekkhā ca.
atk-s0516a:540_8: Sā ca taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjantassa sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā vahati.
atk-s0516a:540_10: Obhāsādīsu hi ālayaṃ kurumānā sukhumā santākārā nikanti uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:540_11: Ettha obhāsādayo kilesavatthutāya “upakkilesā”ti vuttā na akusalattā.
atk-s0516a:540_12: Nikanti pana upakkileso ceva kilesavatthu ca.
atk-s0516a:541_0: Paṇḍito pana bhikkhu obhāsādīsu uppannesu vikkhepaṃ agacchanto “obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo,
atk-s0516a:541_1: upakkilesavimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggo”ti maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti.
atk-s0516a:541_3: ayaṃ na maggo”ti ñatvā ṭhitaṃ ñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhīti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:541_4: Ito paṭṭhāya aṭṭhannaṃ vipassanāñāṇānaṃ vasena sikhāpattavipassanāñāṇaṃ navamañca saccānulomikaṃ ñāṇanti ayaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0516a:541_6: muñcitukamyatāñāṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇanti imāni aṭṭha ñāṇāni nāma.
atk-s0516a:542_0: Tasmā taṃ sampādetukāmena upakkilesavimuttaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ ādiṃkatvā etesu ñāṇesu yogo karaṇīyo.
atk-s0516a:542_1: Udayabbayaṃ passantassa hi aniccalakkhaṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0516a:542_4: dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti cā”ti passato anattalakkhaṇañca.
atk-s0516a:543_0: Ettha ca aniccaṃ aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dukkhaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇaṃ anattā anattalakkhaṇanti ayaṃ vibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:543_8: taṃ dukkha”nti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ dukkhaṃ. Kasmā?
atk-s0516a:543_12: tadanattā”ti vacanato tadeva khandhapañcakaṃ anattā. Kasmā?
atk-s0516a:543_15: Imāni tīṇipi lakkhaṇāni udayabbayaṃ passantasseva ārammaṇāni honti.
atk-s0516a:544_1: tassa saṅkhārā lahuṃ lahuṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchanti,
atk-s0516a:544_2: tato uppādaṃ vā ṭhitiṃ vā pavattaṃ vā nimittaṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ akatvā tesaṃ khayavayanirodhe eva sati santiṭṭhati,
atk-s0516a:544_4: Imassa uppādato paṭṭhāya ayaṃ yogī “yathā ime saṅkhārā bhijjanti nirujjhanti,
atk-s0516a:544_7: Tassa bhaṅgānupassanāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa bahulīkarontassa sabbabhavayoni gatiṭṭhiti sattāvāsesu pabhedakā
atk-s0516a:544_8: saṅkhārā jalitaaṅgārakāsuādayo viya mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0516a:545_0: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa sabbe bhavādayo ādittaaṅgāraṃ viya samussitakhaggo viya paccatthiko
atk-s0516a:545_3: Tassa evaṃ saṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa bhavādīsupi saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavattā saṅkhāresu ukkaṇṭhanā anabhirati uppajjati,
atk-s0516a:546_0: Sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ukkaṇṭhantassa tasmā saṅkhāragatā muñcitukāmatā nissaritukāmatā hoti.
atk-s0516a:546_2: Puna tasmā saṅkhāragatā muñcituṃ pana te eva saṅkhāre paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇena tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā tīraṇaṃ paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ nāma.
atk-s0516a:547_0: So evaṃ tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto tesu anattalakkhaṇassa sudiṭṭhattā “attā”ti vā “attaniya”nti
atk-s0516a:547_1: vā agaṇhanto saṅkhāresu bhayañca nandiñca pahāya saṅkhāresu udāsīno hoti majjhatto,
atk-s0516a:548_0: Taṃ panesa ce santipadaṃ nibbānaṃ santato passati,
atk-s0516a:548_3: punappunaṃ “anicca”nti vā “dukkha”nti vā “anattā”ti vā tividhānupassanāvasena saṅkhārārammaṇameva hutvā pavattati.
atk-s0516a:548_4: Evaṃ tiṭṭhamānañca etaṃ tividhavimokkhamukhabhāvaṃ āpajjitvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0516a:548_6: Evaṃ aniccato manasikaronto adhimokkhabahulo animittaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0516a:548_7: dukkhato manasikaronto passaddhibahulo appaṇihitaṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati,
atk-s0516a:548_8: anattato manasikaronto vedabahulo suññataṃ vimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati.
atk-s0516a:549_0: Ettha ca animitto vimokkhoti animittākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto ariyamaggo.
atk-s0516a:549_1: So hi animittāya dhātuyā uppannattā animitto,
atk-s0516a:549_3: Eteneva nayena appaṇihitākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto appaṇihito,
atk-s0516a:549_4: suññatākārena nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavatto suññatoti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:550_0: Evaṃ adhigatasaṅkhārupekkhassa kulaputtassa vipassanā sikhāppattā hoti.
atk-s0516a:550_2: Assa taṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ āsevantassa tikkhatarā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:550_3: Tassa “idāni maggo uppajjissatī”ti saṅkhāre “aniccā”ti vā “dukkhā”ti vā “anattā”ti vā sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
atk-s0516a:550_4: bhavaṅgānantaraṃ saṅkhārupekkhāya kathitanayeneva aniccādiākārena manasikaritvā uppajjati manodvārāvajjanaṃ,
atk-s0516a:551_1: Idaṃ pana anulomañāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇāya vuṭṭhānagāminiyā vipassanāya pariyosānaṃ hoti,
atk-s0516a:551_2: nippariyāyena pana gotrabhuñāṇameva vipassanāya pariyosānanti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:551_3: Tato paraṃ nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kurumānaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ atikkamamānaṃ ariyagottaṃ okkamamānaṃ nibbānārammaṇe
atk-s0516a:551_5: Idaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhiñca ñāṇadassanavisuddhiñca na bhajati.
atk-s0516a:551_7: Vipassanāsote patitattā “paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhī”ti vā “vipassanā”ti vā saṅkhaṃ gacchati.
atk-s0516a:551_8: Nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā gotrabhuñāṇe niruddhe tena dinnasaññāya nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ
atk-s0516a:551_9: sīlabbataparāmāsasaṃyojanaṃ vicikicchāsaṃyojananti tīṇi saṃyojanāni viddhaṃsento sotāpattimaggo uppajjati,
atk-s0516a:551_10: tadanantaraṃ tasseva vipākabhūtāni dve tīṇi vā phalacittāni uppajjanti anantaravipākattā lokuttarakusalānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:551_11: phalapariyosāne panassa uppannabhavaṅgaṃ vicchinditvā paccavekkhaṇatthāya manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0516a:551_12: So hi “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti maggaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0516a:551_13: Tato “me ayaṃ ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0516a:551_14: Tato “ime nāma kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati.
atk-s0516a:551_15: Tato “ime nāma kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhakilese paccavekkhati.
atk-s0516a:551_16: Avasāne ca “ayaṃ dhammo mayā paṭividdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati.
atk-s0516a:551_17: Iti sotāpannassa ariyasāvakassa pañca paccavekkhaṇāni honti.
atk-s0516a:552_0: Evaṃ paccavekkhitvā so yogāvacaro tasmiṃyeva āsane nisinno vuttanayena vipassitvā kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvaṃ karonto dutiyamaggaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0516a:552_2: Tato vuttanayena vipassitvā kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ anavasesappahānaṃ karonto tatiyamaggaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0516a:552_4: Tato tasmiṃyevāsane vuttanayena vipassitvā rūparāgārūparāgamānuddhaccāvijjānaṃ anavasesappahānaṃ karonto catutthamaggaṃ pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0516a:552_6: Ettāvatā cesa hoti arahā mahākhīṇāsavo paccekabuddho.
atk-s0516a:552_7: Iti imesu catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ ñāṇadassanavisuddhi nāma.
atk-s0516a:553_0: Ettāvatā “sabbesu bhūtesu nidhāya daṇḍaṃ aviheṭhayaṃ aññatarampi tesa”nti etena pātimokkhasaṃvarādisīlassa vuttattā sīlavisuddhi.
atk-s0516a:553_1: “Na puttamiccheyya kuto sahāya”nti etena paṭighānunayavivajjanavasena mettādīnaṃ vuttattā cittavisuddhi.
atk-s0516a:553_2: “Eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti iminā pana nāmarūpapariggahādīnaṃ vuttattā diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi
atk-s0516a:553_3: maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti satta visuddhiyo vuttā honti.
atk-s0516a:553_5: vitthāraṃ pana icchantena visuddhimaggaṃ oloketvā gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:555_0: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhī, eko care khaggavisāṇakappo”ti. –
atk-s0516a:556_0: Pasaṃsiyādibhāvaṃ āpajjitvā gandhamādanapabbataṃ upasobhayamāno vihāsinti evaṃ sabbattha.
atk-s0516a:558_3: Tattha aññamaññaṃ disvā cakkhuviññāṇavīthivasena uppannarāgo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0516a:558_4: Tattha sīhaḷadīpe kāḷadīghavāpīgāme piṇḍāya carantaṃ kalyāṇavihāravāsiṃ daharabhikkhuṃ disvā paṭibaddhacittā
atk-s0516a:558_5: kenaci upāyena taṃ alabhitvā kālakatā kuṭumbiyadhītā tassā nivāsanacoḷakkhaṇḍaṃ disvā “evarūpāya vatthadhāriniyā
atk-s0516a:558_6: nāma saddhiṃ saṃvāsaṃ nālattha”nti hadayaṃ phāletvā kālakato so eva ca daharo nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:559_0: Parehi pana kathiyamānaṃ rūpādisampattiṃ attanā vā hasitalapitagītasaddaṃ sutvā sotaviññāṇavīthivasena uppanno rāgo savanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0516a:559_1: Tatrāpi girigāmavāsīkammāradhītāya pañcahi kumārīhi saddhiṃ padumassaraṃ gantvā nhāyitvā mālaṃ sīse āropetvā
atk-s0516a:559_2: uccāsaddena gāyantiyā ākāsena gacchanto saddaṃ sutvā kāmarāgena jhānā parihāyitvā anayabyasanaṃ patto
atk-s0516a:560_3: tattha mahājane āgate rājāpi agamāsi saddhiṃ antepurena.
atk-s0516a:560_4: Tato rājadhītāya tassa rūpañca saddañca āgamma balavarāgo uppanno tassa ca daharassāpi.
atk-s0516a:560_5: Taṃ disvā rājā sallakkhetvā sāṇipākārena parikkhipāpesi,
atk-s0516a:560_7: Puna sāṇipākāraṃ apanetvā passantā dvepi kālakateyeva addasaṃsūti.
atk-s0516a:561_0: Aññamaññaṃ ālapanasamullapane uppannarāgo pana samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0516a:561_1: Bhikkhubhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ paribhogakaraṇe uppannarāgo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma.
atk-s0516a:561_2: Dvīsupi ca etesu maricavaṭṭivihāre bhikkhu ca bhikkhunī ca nidassanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:561_3: Maricavaṭṭimahāvihāramahe kira duṭṭhagāmaṇi abhayamahārājā mahādānaṃ paṭiyādetvā ubhatosaṅghaṃ parivisati.
atk-s0516a:561_4: Tattha uṇhayāguyā dinnāya saṅghanavakasāmaṇerī anādhārakassa sattavassikasaṅghanavakasāmaṇerassa dantavalayaṃ datvā samullāpaṃ akāsi,
atk-s0516a:561_5: te ubhopi upasampajjitvā saṭṭhivassā hutvā paratīraṃ gatā aññamaññaṃ samullāpena pubbasaññaṃ paṭilabhitvā
atk-s0516a:561_6: tāvadeva jātasinehā sikkhāpadāni vītikkamitvā pārājikā ahesunti.
atk-s0516a:562_0: Evaṃ pañcavidhe saṃsagge yena kenaci saṃsaggena jātasaṃsaggassa bhavanti snehā,
atk-s0516a:562_2: Tato snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotīti tameva snehaṃ anugacchantaṃ sandiṭṭhikasamparāyikasokaparidevādinānappakārakaṃ
atk-s0516a:563_0: Evamatthappabhedaṃ imaṃ aḍḍhagāthaṃ vatvā so paccekabuddho āha –
atk-s0516a:563_2: tassa dukkhassa mūlaṃ khananto paccekasambodhiṃ adhigato”ti.
atk-s0516a:563_7: “tumhe vā aññe vā yo imamhā dukkhā muccitukāmo,
atk-s0516a:563_10: Ettha ca yaṃ taṃ “snehanvayaṃ dukkhamidaṃ pahotī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0516a:563_11: tadeva sandhāya “ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno”ti idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:563_12: Atha vā yathāvuttena saṃsaggena saṃsaggajātassa bhavanti snehā,
atk-s0516a:563_14: evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ ādīnavaṃ snehajaṃ pekkhamāno ahaṃ adhigatoti evampi abhisambandhitvā catutthapādo pubbe vuttanayeneva udānavasena vuttoti veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:564_0: Niddese anuppādetīti rūpasmiṃ anubyañjanaṃ disvā allīyati.
atk-s0516a:564_6: Sambhavanti sañjāyanti abhinibbattantīti tīṇi upasaggena vaḍḍhitāni.
atk-s0516a:566_5: Keci gamanāgamanaṭṭhānanisajjāsamullāpādīsu hadayasukhajananena suhajjāva honti, na mittā.
atk-s0516a:566_6: Keci tadubhayavasena suhajjā ceva mittā ca.
atk-s0516a:566_7: Te duvidhā honti agāriyā ca anagāriyā ca.
atk-s0516a:566_8: Tattha agāriyā tividhā honti upakārā samānasukhadukkhā anukampakāti.
atk-s0516a:566_10: Evaṃ te catūhi catūhi aṅgehi samannāgatā honti.
atk-s0516a:576_1: tathā attatthaparatthaubhayatthavasenāpi tividhaṃ atthaṃ laddhavināsanena aladdhānuppādanenāti dvidhāpi hāpeti vināseti.
atk-s0516a:576_4: eso me parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ nīce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
atk-s0516a:576_7: ahaṃ tesaṃ parāyaṇa”nti evaṃ attānaṃ ucce ṭhāne ṭhapentopi paṭibaddhacitto hoti.
atk-s0516a:579_12: Yā apekkhāti yā taṇhā yo sneho.
atk-s0516a:579_15: Yathā vaṃso visālo visatto eva hoti,
atk-s0516a:579_16: puttesu ca dāresu ca yā apekkhā,
atk-s0516a:579_17: sāpi evaṃ tāni vatthūni saṃsibbitvā ṭhitattā visattā eva.
atk-s0516a:579_18: Svāhaṃ tāya apekkhāya apekkhavā visālo vaṃso viya visattoti evaṃ apekkhāya ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ apekkhaṃ
atk-s0516a:579_19: maggañāṇena chindanto ayaṃ vaṃsakaḷīrova rūpādīsu vā diṭṭhādīsu vā lābhādīsu vā kāmabhavādīsu vā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0516a:581_1: Pañcame migoti sabbesaṃ āraññikacatuppadānaṃ eva etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:581_3: Araññamhīti gāmañca gāmūpacārañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ araññaṃ,
atk-s0516a:581_9: Yenicchakaṃ gacchati gocarāyāti yena disābhāgena gantuṃ icchati,
atk-s0516a:581_19: Lokuttaradhammā hi kilesavasaṃ agamanato serino tehi samannāgatā puggalā ca,
atk-s0516a:581_24: Kadā nu kho ahampi taṇhābandhanaṃ chinditvā evaṃ gaccheyyanti iti me tumhehi ito cito ca parivāretvā
atk-s0516a:581_25: ṭhitehi baddhassa yenicchakaṃ gantuṃ alabhantassa tasmiṃ yenicchakagamanābhāve ādīnavaṃ yenicchakagamane
atk-s0516a:581_28: Tasmā aññopi viññū naro seritaṃ pekkhamāno,
atk-s0516a:583_2: sahāyamajjhe ṭhitassa divāseyyasaṅkhāte vāse ca mahāupaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte ṭhāne ca uyyānagamanasaṅkhāte gamane
atk-s0516a:583_3: ca janapadacārikasaṅkhātāya cārikāya ca “idaṃ me suṇa,
atk-s0516a:583_4: idaṃ me dehī”tiādinā nayena tathā tathā āmantanā hoti,
atk-s0516a:583_5: tasmā ahaṃ tattha tattha nibbijjitvā yāyaṃ ariyajanasevitā anekānisaṃsā ekantasukhā,
atk-s0516a:583_6: evaṃ santepi lobhābhibhūtehi sabbakāpurisehi anabhijjhitā apatthitā pabbajjā,
atk-s0516a:583_7: taṃ anabhijjhitaṃ paresaṃ avasavattanena bhabbapuggalavaseneva ca seritaṃ pekkhamāno vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā anukkamena paccekasambodhiṃ adhigatoti.
atk-s0516a:585_2: Sā duvidhā hoti kāyikā ca vācasikā ca.
atk-s0516a:585_5: Vācasikā nāma gītaṃ silokabhaṇanaṃ mukhabherikanti evamādi.
atk-s0516a:585_7: Vipulanti yāva aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca ṭhānena sakalattabhāvabyāpakaṃ.
atk-s0516a:587_2: “ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā vā nayena brahmavihārabhāvanāpharitā catasso disā assa santītipi cātuddiso.
atk-s0516a:587_3: Tāsu disāsu katthaci satte vā saṅkhāre vā bhayena na paṭihaññatīti appaṭigho.
atk-s0516a:587_6: Parissayānaṃ sahitā achambhīti ettha parissayanti kāyacittāni,
atk-s0516a:587_9: bāhirānaṃ sīhabyagghādīnaṃ abbhantarānañca kāmacchandādīnaṃ kāyacittupaddavānaṃ etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:587_10: Te parissaye adhivāsanakhantiyā ca vīriyādīhi ca dhammehi sahatīti parissayānaṃ sahitā.
atk-s0516a:587_14: evaṃ itarītarena paccayena santussamāno ettha paṭipattipadaṭṭhāne santose ṭhito catūsu disāsu mettādibhāvanāya cātuddiso,
atk-s0516a:587_17: appaṭighattā achambhī ca hotīti etaṃ paṭipattiguṇaṃ disvā yoniso paṭipajjitvā paccekasambodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:588_0: Atha vā te samaṇā viya santussamāno itarītarena vuttanayeneva cātuddiso hotīti ñatvā evaṃ cātuddisabhāvaṃ patthayanto yoniso paṭipajjitvā adhigatomhi.
atk-s0516a:588_1: Tasmā aññopi īdisaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthayamāno cātuddisatāya parissayānaṃ sahitā appaṭighatāya ca achambhī hutvā eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0516a:589_0: Niddese mettāti atthato tāva mijjatīti mettā,
atk-s0516a:589_6: Ekaṃ disanti ekissā disāya paṭhamapariggahitaṃ sattaṃ upādāya ekaṃ disaṃ pariyāpannasattapharaṇavasena vuttaṃ.
atk-s0516a:589_9: Tathā dutiyanti yathā puratthimādīsu disāsu yaṃ kiñci ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharati,
atk-s0516a:589_10: tatheva tadanantaraṃ dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthañcāti attho.
atk-s0516a:590_0: Iti uddhanti eteneva ca nayena uparimaṃ disanti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:590_1: Adho tiriyanti adhodisampi tiriyaṃ disampi evameva.
atk-s0516a:590_4: Evaṃ sabbadisāsu assamaṇḍale assamiva mettāsahagataṃ cittaṃ sāretipi paccāsāretipīti.
atk-s0516a:590_5: Ettāvatā ekamekaṃ disaṃ pariggahetvā odhiso mettāpharaṇaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0516a:590_9: “ayaṃ parasatto”ti vibhāgaṃ akatvā attasamatāyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:591_6: Yasmā vā ettha odhiso pharaṇe viya puna tathā-
atk-s0516a:591_11: Vipulenāti ettha ca pharaṇavasena vipulatā daṭṭhabbā.
atk-s0516a:592_22: te kassa ruciyā sukhitā vā bhavissanti,
atk-s0516a:592_24: pattasampattito vā na parihāyissantī”ti evaṃ pavattakammassakatādassanapadaṭṭhānā.
atk-s0516a:593_0: Tattha santuṭṭho hotīti paccayasantosavasena santuṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0516a:593_1: Itarītarena cīvarenāti na thūlasukhumalūkhapaṇītathirajiṇṇānaṃ yena kenaci cīvarena,
atk-s0516a:593_2: atha kho yathāladdhānaṃ itarītarena yena kenaci santuṭṭho hotīti attho.
atk-s0516a:593_8: Iti ime tayo santose sandhāya “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena.
atk-s0516a:593_9: Yathāladdhādīsu yena kenaci cīvarena santuṭṭho hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0516a:594_5: Tattha cīvaraṃ jānitabbanti khomādīni cha cīvarāni dukūlādīni cha anulomacīvarānipi jānitabbāni.
atk-s0516a:594_7: Kusacīraṃ vākacīraṃ phalakacīraṃ kesakambalaṃ vāḷakambalaṃ potthako cammaṃ ulūkapakkhaṃ rukkhadussaṃ
atk-s0516a:594_8: latādussaṃ erakadussaṃ kadalidussaṃ veḷudussanti evamādīni pana akappiyacīvarāni.
atk-s0516a:595_0: Cīvarakhettanti “saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vā”ti evaṃ uppajjanato cha khettāni,
atk-s0516a:595_1: aṭṭhannañca mātikānaṃ vasena aṭṭha khettāni jānitabbāni.
atk-s0516a:596_0: Paṃsukūlanti sosānikaṃ pāpaṇikaṃ rathiyaṃ saṅkārakūṭaṃ sotthiyaṃ sinānaṃ titthaṃ gatapaccāgataṃ aggiḍaḍḍhaṃ
atk-s0516a:596_1: gokhāyitaṃ upacikākhāyitaṃ undūrakhāyitaṃ antacchinnaṃ dasacchinnaṃ dhajāhaṭaṃ thūpaṃ samaṇacīvaraṃ sāmuddiyaṃ
atk-s0516a:596_2: ābhisekiyaṃ panthikaṃ vātāhaṭaṃ iddhimayaṃ devadattiyanti tevīsati paṃsukūlāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0516a:596_4: Gatapaccāgatanti matakasarīraṃ pārupitvā susānaṃ netvā ānītacīvaraṃ.
atk-s0516a:596_8: Panthikanti panthaṃ gacchantehi corabhayena pāsāṇehi koṭṭetvā pārutacīvaraṃ.
atk-s0516a:597_1: cīvare vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso loluppavivajjanasantoso
atk-s0516a:597_2: yathālābhasantoso yathābalasantoso yathāsāruppasantoso udakasantoso dhovanasantoso karaṇasantoso parimāṇasantoso
atk-s0516a:597_3: suttasantoso sibbanasantoso rajanasantoso kappasantoso paribhogasantoso sannidhiparivajjanasantoso vissajjanasantosoti.
atk-s0516a:597_4: Tattha sādakabhikkhuno temāsaṃ nibaddhavāsaṃ vasitvā ekamāsamattaṃ vitakkituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0516a:597_5: So hi pavāretvā cīvaramāse cīvaraṃ karoti.
atk-s0516a:597_8: Cīvaratthāya gacchantassa pana “kattha labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīseneva gamanaṃ gamanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:597_9: Pariyesantassa pana yena vā tena vā saddhiṃ apariyesitvā lajjiṃ pesalabhikkhuṃ gahetvā pariyesanaṃ pariyesanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:597_10: Evaṃ pariyesantassa āhariyamānaṃ cīvaraṃ dūratova disvā “etaṃ manāpaṃ bhavissati,
atk-s0516a:597_11: etaṃ amanāpa”nti evaṃ avitakketvā thūlasukhumādīsu yathāladdheneva santussanaṃ paṭilābhasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:597_13: ettakaṃ ekapaṭṭassā”ti attano pahonakamatteneva santussanaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:597_14: Cīvaraṃ pariyesantassa pana “asukassa gharadvāre manāpaṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā dvārapaṭipāṭiyā caraṇaṃ loluppavivajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_0: Lūkhapaṇītesu yena kenaci yāpetuṃ sakkontassa yathāladdheneva yāpanaṃ yathālābhasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_1: Attano thāmaṃ jānitvā yena yāpetuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0516a:598_3: Manāpaṃ aññassa datvā attanā yena kenaci yāpanaṃ yathāsāruppasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_5: kattha amanāpa”nti avicāretvā yena kenaci dhovanupagena udakena dhovanaṃ udakasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_6: Tathā paṇḍumattikagerukapūtipaṇṇarasakiliṭṭhāni pana udakāni vajjetuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0516a:598_7: Dhovantassa pana muggarādīhi apaharitvā hatthehi madditvā dhovanaṃ dhovanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_8: Tathā asujjhantaṃ paṇṇāni pakkhipitvā tāpitaudakenāpi dhovituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0516a:598_10: idaṃ sukhuma”nti akopetvā pahonakanīhāreneva karaṇaṃ karaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:598_12: Cīvarakaraṇatthāya pana “manāpaṃ suttaṃ pariyesissāmī”ti avicāretvā rathikādīsu vā devaṭṭhāne vā āharitvā
atk-s0516a:598_13: pādamūle vā ṭhapitaṃ yaṃ kiñcideva suttaṃ gahetvā karaṇaṃ suttasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:599_0: Kusibandhanakāle pana aṅgulimatte sattavāre na vijjhitabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:599_1: Evaṃ karontassa hi yo bhikkhu sahāyo na hoti,
atk-s0516a:599_8: Rajantena pana kāḷakacchakādīni pariyesantena na rajitabbaṃ,
atk-s0516a:599_11: Alabhantena pana manussehi araññe vākaṃ gahetvā chaḍḍitarajanaṃ vā bhikkhūhi pacitvā chaḍḍitakasaṭaṃ vā gahetvā rajitabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:599_13: Nīlakaddamakāḷasāmesu yaṃ kiñci gahetvā hatthipiṭṭhe nisinnassa paññāyamānakappakaraṇaṃ kappasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:600_1: Dussaṃ pana labhitvā suttaṃ vā sūciṃ vā kārakaṃ vā alabhantena ṭhapetuṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0516a:600_8: Aññasmiṃ cīvare sati paccattharaṇampi adhiṭṭhātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0516a:600_12: Vissajjentena pana mukhaṃ oloketvā na dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0516a:600_13: sāraṇīyadhamme ṭhatvāva vissajjetabbanti ayaṃ vissajjanasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:601_1: Iti cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno paccekasambuddho imāni dve dhutaṅgāni gopeti,
atk-s0516a:602_8: Tathārūpo so paccekasambuddho taṃ dassetuṃ “itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0516a:603_3: Yathā ekacco “kathaṃ nu kho cīvaraṃ labhissāmī”ti puññavantehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kohaññaṃ karonto uttasati paritassati,
atk-s0516a:603_4: paccekasambuddho evaṃ aladdhā ca cīvaraṃ na paritassati.
atk-s0516a:603_9: Ādīnavadassāvīti anesanāpattiyañca gadhitaparibhoge ca ādīnavaṃ passamāno.
atk-s0516a:603_10: Nissaraṇapaññoti “yāvadeva sītassa paṭighātāyā”ti vuttaṃ nissaraṇameva pajānanto.
atk-s0516a:604_3: ko mayā sadiso atthī”ti attukkaṃsanaṃ karoti.
atk-s0516a:604_5: Na paraṃ vambhetīti “ime panaññe bhikkhū na paṃsukūlikāti vā paṃsukūlikamattampi etesaṃ natthī”ti vā evaṃ paraṃ na vambheti.
atk-s0516a:604_6: Yo hi tattha dakkhoti yo tasmiṃ cīvarasantose vaṇṇavādī.
atk-s0516a:604_9: Sampajāno patissatoti sampajānapaññāya ceva satiyā ca yutto.
atk-s0516a:605_5: Tattha piṇḍapātoti odano kummāso sattu maccho maṃsaṃ khīraṃ dadhi sappi navanītaṃ telaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ
atk-s0516a:605_6: yāgu khādanīyaṃ sāyanīyaṃ lehanīyanti soḷasa piṇḍapātā.
atk-s0516a:606_0: Piṇḍapātakhettanti saṅghabhattaṃ uddesabhattaṃ nimantanaṃ salākabhattaṃ pakkhikaṃ uposathikaṃ pāṭipadikaṃ
atk-s0516a:606_1: āgantukabhattaṃ gamikabhattaṃ gilānabhattaṃ gilānupaṭṭhākabhattaṃ dhurabhattaṃ kuṭibhattaṃ vārabhattaṃ
atk-s0516a:607_0: Piṇḍapātasantosoti piṇḍapāte vitakkasantoso gamanasantoso pariyesanasantoso paṭilābhasantoso paṭiggahaṇasantoso
atk-s0516a:607_2: upakārasantoso parimāṇasantoso paribhogasantoso sannidhiparivajjanasantoso vissajjanasantosoti pannarasa santosā.
atk-s0516a:607_3: Tattha sādako bhikkhu mukhaṃ dhovitvā vitakketi.
atk-s0516a:607_4: Piṇḍapātikena pana gaṇena saddhiṃ caratā sāyaṃ therupaṭṭhānakāle “sve kattha piṇḍāya carissāmā”ti “asukagāme,
atk-s0516a:607_5: bhante”ti ettakaṃ cintetvā tato paṭṭhāya na vitakketabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:607_7: Tato paṭṭhāya vitakkento pana ariyavaṃsā cuto hoti paribāhiro.
atk-s0516a:607_9: Piṇḍāya pavisantena pana “kuhiṃ labhissāmī”ti acintetvā kammaṭṭhānasīsena gantabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:607_11: Pariyesantena yaṃ vā taṃ vā aggahetvā lajjiṃ pesalameva gahetvā pariyesitabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:607_17: idaṃ amanāpaṃ na gaṇhissāmī”ti acintetvā yaṃ kiñci yāpanamattaṃ gahetabbameva.
atk-s0516a:608_12: Paṭiggahaṇasmiñhi mattaṃ ajānanto manussānaṃ pasādaṃ makkheti,
atk-s0516a:608_16: Iti mattaṃ jānitvāva paṭiggahetabbanti ayaṃ mattapaṭiggahaṇasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:609_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuñjitvā “samaṇadhammaṃ anupālessāmī”ti evaṃ upakāraṃ ñatvā paribhuñjanaṃ upakārasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:609_5: Jighacchāya paṭivinodanaṃ “na idamettha nissaraṇa”nti evaṃ paribhuñjanaṃ paribhogasantoso nāma.
atk-s0516a:610_0: Piṇḍapātapaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ sapadānacārikaṅgaṃ ekāsanikaṅgaṃ pattapiṇḍikaṅgaṃ khalupacchābhattikaṅganti.
atk-s0516a:610_1: Iti piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno paccekasambuddho imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti,
atk-s0516a:611_4: Tattha senāsananti mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisi bimbohanaṃ vihāro aḍḍhayogo pāsādo hammiyaṃ guhā leṇaṃ aṭṭo māḷo
atk-s0516a:611_5: veḷugumbo rukkhamūlaṃ yattha vā pana bhikkhū paṭikkamantīti imāni pannarasa senāsanāni.
atk-s0516a:612_0: Senāsanakhettanti saṅghato vā gaṇato vā ñātito vā mittato vā attano vā dhanena paṃsukūlaṃ vāti cha khettāni.
atk-s0516a:613_2: Senāsanapaṭisaṃyuttāni pana pañca dhutaṅgāni āraññikaṅgaṃ rukkhamūlikaṅgaṃ abbhokāsikaṅgaṃ sosānikaṅgaṃ yathāsanthatikaṅganti.
atk-s0516a:613_3: Iti senāsanasantosaṃ mahāariyavaṃsaṃ pūrayamāno paccekasambuddho imāni pañca dhutaṅgāni gopeti,
atk-s0516a:614_0: Iti āyasmā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero pathaviṃ pattharamāno viya sāgarakucchiṃ pūrayamāno viya ākāsaṃ
atk-s0516a:614_1: vitthārayamāno viya ca paṭhamaṃ cīvarasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetvā candaṃ uṭṭhāpento viya sūriyaṃ ullaṅghento
atk-s0516a:614_2: viya ca dutiyapiṇḍapātasantosaṃ kathetvā sineruṃ ukkhipento viya tatiyaṃ senāsanasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0516a:614_3: kathetvā idāni gilānapaccayasantosaṃ ariyavaṃsaṃ kathetuṃ “santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārenā”tiādimāha.
atk-s0516a:617_0: Porāṇe aggaññe ariyavaṃse ṭhitoti ettha porāṇeti na adhunuppattike.
atk-s0516a:617_3: Yathā hi khattiyavaṃso brāhmaṇavaṃso vessavaṃso suddavaṃso samaṇavaṃso kulavaṃso rājavaṃso,
atk-s0516a:617_6: So kho panāyaṃ vaṃso imesaṃ vaṃsānaṃ mūlagandhādīnaṃ kālānusārigandhādayo viya aggamakkhāyati.
atk-s0516a:617_9: Ariyā vuccanti buddhā ca paccekabuddhā ca tathāgatasāvakā ca,
atk-s0516a:617_11: Ito pubbe hi satasahassakappādhikānaṃ catunnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyānaṃ matthake taṇhaṅkaro medhaṅkaro saraṇaṅkaro dīpaṅkaroti cattāro buddhā uppannā, te ariyā,
atk-s0516a:617_13: Tesaṃ buddhānaṃ parinibbānato aparabhāge asaṅkhyeyyaṃ atikkamitvā koṇḍañño nāma buddho uppanno…pe…
atk-s0516a:617_14: imasmiṃ kappe kakusandho koṇāgamano kassapo amhākaṃ bhagavā gotamoti cattāro buddhā uppannā,
atk-s0516a:617_16: Api ca atītānāgatapaccuppannānaṃ sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhabuddhasāvakānaṃ ariyānaṃ vaṃsoti ariyavaṃso,
atk-s0516a:619_4: tathāvidhā eva ca atho gahaṭṭhā gharamāvasantā.
atk-s0516a:619_5: Etamahaṃ dussaṅgahabhāvaṃ jigucchanto vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:620_4: Aññeneva mukhaṃ karontīti ovādadāyake disvā mukhaṃ parivattetvā aññaṃ disābhāgaṃ olokenti.
atk-s0516a:623_1: “aho vatāhampi oropayitvā gihibyañjanāni sañchinnapatto yathā koviḷāro bhaveyya”nti evañhi cintayamāno
atk-s0516a:628_1: Dutiyavaggassa paṭhamadvaye nipakanti pakatinipuṇaṃ paṇḍitaṃ kasiṇaparikammādīsu kusalaṃ.
atk-s0516a:628_2: Sādhuvihārinti appanāvihārena vā upacārena vā samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0516a:628_7: “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
atk-s0516a:628_9: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitaṃ pahāyāti yathā paṭirājā “vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ anatthāvaha”nti ñatvā rajjaṃ pahāya eko carati evaṃ bālasahāyaṃ pahāya eko care.
atk-s0516a:628_10: Atha vā rājāva raṭṭhanti yathā sutasomo rājā vijitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ pahāya eko cari,
atk-s0516a:628_11: yathā ca mahājanako evaṃ ekova careti ayampi etassattho.
atk-s0516a:628_12: Sesaṃ vuttānusārena sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritaṃ.
atk-s0516a:630_2: Kevalañca pana sahāyasampadanti ettha asekkhehi sīlādikkhandhehi sampannā sahāyā eva “sahāyasampadā”ti veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:630_8: Attano sīlādīhi seṭṭhe sevamānassa sīlādayo dhammā anuppannā uppajjanti,
atk-s0516a:630_10: Same sevamānassa aññamaññasamadhāraṇena kukkuccavinodanena ca laddhā na parihāyanti.
atk-s0516a:630_11: Ete pana sahāyake seṭṭhe ca same ca aladdhā kuhanādimicchājīvaṃ vajjetvā dhammena samena uppannaṃ bhojanaṃ
atk-s0516a:630_12: bhuñjanto tattha ca paṭighānunayaṃ anuppādento anavajjabhojī hutvā atthakāmo kulaputto eko care khaggavisāṇakappo.
atk-s0516a:630_13: Ahampi hi evaṃ caranto imaṃ sampattiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:632_9: disvā bhujasmiṃ suvaṇṇassa valayāni “gaṇavāse sati saṅghaṭṭanā,
atk-s0516a:632_10: ekavāse sati aghaṭṭanā”ti evaṃ cintento vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:634_3: yvāyaṃ etena dutīyena kumārena sītuṇhādīni nivedentena sahavāsena taṃ saññāpentassa mama vācābhilāpo,
atk-s0516a:634_10: Ubhayampi cetaṃ antarāyakaraṃ visesādhigamassāti etaṃ bhayaṃ āyatiṃ pekkhamāno taṃ chaḍḍetvā yoniso paṭipajjitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:636_1: Chaṭṭhe kāmāti dve kāmā vatthukāmā ca kilesakāmā ca.
atk-s0516a:636_12: Evaṃ tena virūparūpena tathā tathā assādaṃ dassetvā mathenti cittaṃ,
atk-s0516a:636_15: Nigamanampi dvīhi tīhi vā padehi yojetvā purimagāthāsu vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:637_4: ahatānaṃ vatthānaṃ diguṇaṃ saṅghāṭi”nti ettha paṭalaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0516a:637_6: vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”ti ettha rāsaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0516a:637_9: kayirā mālāguṇe bahū”ti ettha bandhanaṭṭho guṇaṭṭho.
atk-s0516a:637_15: Iṭṭhāti pariyiṭṭhā vā hontu, mā vā,
atk-s0516a:637_20: Kāmūpasaṃhitāti ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjamānena kāmena upasaṃhitā.
atk-s0516a:638_0: Yadi muddāyātiādīsu muddāti aṅgulipabbesu saññaṃ ṭhapetvā hatthamuddā.
atk-s0516a:638_3: Yāya khettaṃ oloketvā “idha ettakā vīhī bhavissanti”,
atk-s0516a:638_5: ākāsaṃ oloketvā “ime ākāse sakuṇā ettakā nāma bhavissantī”ti jānanti.
atk-s0516a:638_8: Gorakkhanti attano vā paresaṃ vā gāvo rakkhitvā pañcagorasavikkayena jīvanakammaṃ.
atk-s0516a:638_10: Rājaporisanti vinā āvudhena rājakammaṃ katvā rājupaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0516a:639_0: Sītassa purakkhatoti lakkhaṃ viya sarassa sītassa purato ṭhito,
atk-s0516a:639_9: ayaṃ muddādīhi jīvikakappanaṃ āgamma sītādipaccayo ābādho.
atk-s0516a:639_14: Kāmahetūtiādīsu paccayaṭṭhena kāmā assa hetūti kāmahetu.
atk-s0516a:639_19: Kāmānameva hetūti idaṃ niyamavacanaṃ kāmapaccayā uppajjatiyevāti attho.
atk-s0516a:640_10: Sammohaṃ āpajjatīti visaññī viya sammūḷho hoti.
atk-s0516a:641_1: Kinti meti kena nu kho me upāyena.
atk-s0516a:641_2: Yampi meti yampi mayhaṃ kasikammādīni katvā uppāditaṃ dhanaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0516a:641_3: Tampi no natthīti tampi amhākaṃ idāni natthi.
atk-s0516a:642_3: Tattha kāmahetūti kāmapaccayā rājānopi rājūhi vivadantīti attho.
atk-s0516a:642_8: Kāmānameva hetūti gāmanigamasenāpatipurohitaṭṭhānantarādīnaṃ kāmānaṃyeva hetu vivadantīti attho.
atk-s0516a:644_0: Dhanukalāpaṃ sannayhitvāti dhanuṃ gahetvā sarakalāpaṃ sannayhitvā.
atk-s0516a:645_0: Addāvalepanā upakāriyoti cettha manussā pākārapādaṃ assakhurasaṇṭhānena iṭṭhakāhi cinitvā upari sudhāya limpanti.
atk-s0516a:645_2: Tā tintena kalalena sittā addāvalepanā nāma honti.
atk-s0516a:645_3: Pakkhandantīti tāsaṃ heṭṭhā tikhiṇaayasūlarukkhasūlādīhi vijjhiyamānā pākārassa picchillabhāvena ārohituṃ asakkontāpi upadhāvantiyeva.
atk-s0516a:645_6: Taṃ aṭṭhadantākārena katvā “nagaradvāraṃ bhinditvā pavisissāmā”ti āgate uparidvāre ṭhitā tassa bandhanayottāni chinditvā tena abhivaggena omaddanti.
atk-s0516a:646_2: Ekāgārikanti paṇṇāsamattāpi saṭṭhimattāpi parivāretvā jīvaggāhaṃ gahetvā dhanaṃ āharāpenti.
atk-s0516a:648_3: Tasmā kāmaguṇāpi ete anekabyasanāvahaṭṭhena daḷhasannipātaṭṭhena ca īti.
atk-s0516a:648_6: Tasmā ete kilesā asucipaggharaṇato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātaparipakkaparibhinnabhāvato ca gaṇḍo.
atk-s0516a:648_10: Tasmā kāmaguṇāpete aviditanibbānatthāvahahetutāya sabbupaddavavatthutāya ca upaddavo.
atk-s0516a:648_11: Yasmā panete kilesāturabhāvaṃ janentā sīlasaṅkhātamārogyaṃ loluppaṃ vā uppādentā pākatikameva ārogyaṃ vilumpanti,
atk-s0516a:648_13: Abbhantaramanupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena pana antotudanaṭṭhena dunnīharaṇīyaṭṭhena ca sallaṃ.
atk-s0516a:649_5: Otiṇṇo sātarūpenāti madhurasabhāvena rāgena otiṇṇo ogāhito.
atk-s0516a:651_4: Sarīsapeti ye keci dīghajātikā saritvā gacchanti.
atk-s0516a:653_5: Yathā ayaṃ hatthī manussakantesu sīlesu dantattā adantabhūmiṃ nāgacchatīti vā,
atk-s0516a:653_7: Evaṃ kudāssu nāmāhampi ariyakantesu sīlesu dantattā adantabhūmiṃ nāgamanena,
atk-s0516a:653_9: puna itthattaṃ anāgamanena ca guṇasarīramahantatāya vā nāgo bhaveyyaṃ.
atk-s0516a:653_10: Yathā cesa yūthāni vivajjayitvā ekacariyasukhena yathābhirantaṃ vihare araññe,
atk-s0516a:653_12: kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ gaṇaṃ vivajjayitvā ekattābhiratisukhena jhānasukhena yathābhirantaṃ araññe attano yathā yathā sukhaṃ,
atk-s0516a:653_14: tattakaṃ araññe nivāsaṃ eko care khaggavisāṇakappo eko careyyanti attho.
atk-s0516a:653_16: kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ asekkhasīlakkhandhamahantatāya sañjātakkhandho bhaveyyaṃ.
atk-s0516a:653_22: kudāssu nāmāhampi evaṃ parisuddhakāyasamācāratādīhi sīlasamādhinibbedhikapaññādīhi vā uḷāro bhaveyyanti
atk-s0516a:653_23: evaṃ cintento vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā paccekabodhiṃ adhigatomhīti.
atk-s0516a:655_8: Sā hi appitappitasamaye eva paccanīkehi vimuccanato “sāmayikā vimuttī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:655_12: yena kāraṇena phassaye iti etaṃ ādiccabandhussa paccekabuddhassa vaco nisamma saṅgaṇikāratiṃ pahāya yoniso paṭipajjanto adhigatomhī”ti āha.
atk-s0516a:660_2: Tāni hi maggasammādiṭṭhiyā visūkaṭṭhena vijjhanaṭṭhena vilomaṭṭhena ca visūkāni.
atk-s0516a:660_6: Patto niyāmanti avinipātadhammatāya sambodhiparāyanatāya ca niyatabhāvaṃ adhigato,
atk-s0516a:660_8: Ettāvatā paṭhamamaggakiccanipphatti ca tassa paṭilābho ca vutto.
atk-s0516a:660_12: Anaññaneyyoti aññehi “idaṃ saccaṃ idaṃ sacca”nti nanetabbo.
atk-s0516a:660_14: Patte vā paccekabodhiñāṇe aññaneyyatāya abhāvā sayaṃvasitaṃ.
atk-s0516a:661_1: Na parappattiyoti paccakkhadhammattā na aññehi saddahāpetabbo.
atk-s0516a:661_2: Na parappaccayoti na assa paro paccayo,
atk-s0516a:661_3: na parassa saddhāya vattatīti na parappaccayo.
atk-s0516a:663_6: Nikkuhoti ettha kiñcāpi yassa tividhakuhanavatthu natthi,
atk-s0516a:663_8: imissā pana gāthāya manuññabhojanādīsu vimhayamanāpajjanato nikkuhoti ayamadhippāyo.
atk-s0516a:663_14: Attano gahaṭṭhakāle sūdassa guṇamakkhanābhāvaṃ sandhāya āha.
atk-s0516a:663_15: Niddhantakasāvamohoti ettha rāgādayo tayo kāyaduccaritādīni ca tīṇīti cha dhammā yathāsambhavaṃ appasannaṭṭhena
atk-s0516a:663_16: sakabhāvaṃ vijahāpetvā parabhāvaṃ gaṇhāpanaṭṭhena kasaṭaṭṭhena ca “kasāvā”ti veditabbā. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:665_0: Tesu mohaṃ ṭhapetvā pañcannaṃ kasāvānaṃ tesañca sabbesaṃ mūlabhūtassa mohassa niddhantattā niddhantakasāvamoho,
atk-s0516a:665_1: tiṇṇaṃ eva vā kāyavacīmanokasāvānaṃ mohassa ca niddhantattā niddhantakasāvamoho.
atk-s0516a:665_6: tīsu bhavesu dvādasasu vā āyatanesu bhavavibhavataṇhāvirahito hutvāti attho.
atk-s0516a:665_8: Atha vā tayopi pāde vatvā eko careti eko carituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti evampi ettha sambandho kātabbo.
atk-s0516a:667_5: Taṃ atthakāmo kulaputto pāpaṃ sahāyaṃ parivajjayetha,
atk-s0516a:667_7: Sayaṃ na seveti attano vasena taṃ na seveyya.
atk-s0516a:667_14: Taṃ evarūpaṃ na seve na bhaje na payirupāse,
atk-s0516a:668_0: Niddese sayaṃ na seveyyāti sāmaṃ na upasaṅkameyya.
atk-s0516a:668_1: Sāmaṃ na seveyyāti cittenapi na upasaṅkameyya.
atk-s0516a:670_2: bahussutanti duvidho bahussuto tīsu piṭakesu atthato nikhilo pariyattibahussuto ca maggaphalavijjābhiññānaṃ paṭividdhattā paṭivedhabahussuto ca.
atk-s0516a:670_5: Yuttapaṭibhāno ca muttapaṭibhāno ca yuttamuttapaṭibhāno ca paṭibhānavā.
atk-s0516a:670_9: Yassa atthañca ñāyañca lakkhaṇañca ṭhānāṭṭhānañca paripucchantassa paripucchā paṭibhāti,
atk-s0516a:670_15: Tato tassānubhāvena attatthaparatthaubhayatthabhedato vā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikaparamatthabhedato vā anekappakārāni aññāya atthāni,
atk-s0516a:670_16: tato “ahosiṃ nu kho ahaṃ atītamaddhāna”ntiādīsu kaṅkhāṭṭhānesu vineyya kaṅkhaṃ vicikicchaṃ vinetvā vināsetvā
atk-s0516a:672_1: Pañcame khiḍḍā ca rati ca pubbe vuttāva.
atk-s0516a:672_3: Vatthukāmāpi hi sukhassa visayādibhāvena sukhanti vuccanti. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:672_5: Evametaṃ khiḍḍaṃ ratiṃ kāmasukhañca imasmiṃ okāsaloke analaṅkaritvā alanti akatvā “etaṃ tappaka”nti vā “sārabhūta”nti vā evaṃ aggahetvā.
atk-s0516a:672_6: Anapekkhamānoti tena analaṅkaraṇena anapekkhanasīlo apihāluko nittaṇho.
atk-s0516a:672_8: Tattha vibhūsā duvidhā agārikavibhūsā ca anagārikavibhūsā ca.
atk-s0516a:676_1: Sattame saṅgo esoti attano upabhogaṃ niddisati.
atk-s0516a:676_2: So hi sajjanti tattha pāṇino kaddame paviṭṭho hatthī viyāti saṅgo.
atk-s0516a:676_3: Parittamettha sokhyanti ettha pañcakāmaguṇūpabhogakāle viparītasaññāya uppādetabbato kāmāvacaradhammapariyāpannato vā lāmakaṭṭhena sokhyaṃ parittaṃ,
atk-s0516a:676_6: Appassādo dukkhamettha bhiyyoti ettha ca yvāyaṃ “yaṃ kho,
atk-s0516a:676_8: ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ,
atk-s0516a:676_14: kulaputto yena sippaṭṭhānena jīvikaṃ kappeti yadi muddāya yadi gaṇanāyā”ti evamādinā nayenettha dukkhaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0516a:676_20: Gaḷo esoti assādaṃ dassetvā ākaḍḍhanavasena baḷiso viya eso,
atk-s0516a:676_22: Iti ñatvā matimāti evaṃ ñatvā buddhimā paṇḍito puriso sabbampetaṃ pahāya eko care khaggavisāṇakappoti.
atk-s0516a:678_6: Tasmiṃ nadīsalile jālaṃ bhetvā gataambucārīvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:678_8: Yathā aggi daḍḍhaṭṭhānaṃ puna na nivattati,
atk-s0516a:679_1: taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanāni.
atk-s0516a:679_2: Imāni pana saṃyojanāni kilesapaṭipāṭiyāpi āharituṃ vaṭṭati maggapaṭipāṭiyāpi.
atk-s0516a:681_2: satta gīvaṭṭhīni paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapetvā parivajjanapahātabbadassanatthaṃ yugamattaṃ pekkhamānoti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0516a:681_5: Na ca pādaloloti ekassa dutiyo dvinnaṃ tatiyoti evaṃ gaṇamajjhaṃ,
atk-s0516a:681_8: Guttindriyoti chasu indriyesu idha manindriyassa visuṃ vuttattā vuttāvasesavasena gopitindriyo.
atk-s0516a:681_13: Anavassutoti imāya paṭipattiyā tesu tesu ārammaṇesu kilesaanvāssavavirahito.
atk-s0516a:681_14: Apariḍayhamānoti evaṃ anvāssavavirahitā eva kilesaggīhi apariḍayhamāno,
atk-s0516a:682_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti kāraṇavasena “cakkhū”ti laddhavohārena rūpadassanasamatthena cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā.
atk-s0516a:683_3: Īdisī panesā ‘dhanunā vijjhatī’tiādīsu viya sasambhārakathā nāma hoti,
atk-s0516a:683_4: tasmā cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvāti ayamevettha attho”ti.
atk-s0516a:684_0: Nimittaggāhīti itthipurisanimittaṃ vā subhanimittādikaṃ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṃ nimittaṃ chandarāgavasena gaṇhāti,
atk-s0516a:684_2: Anubyañjanaggāhīti kilesānaṃ anubyañjanato pākaṭabhāvakaraṇato “anubyañjana”nti laddhavohāraṃ hatthapādahasitalapitavilokitādibhedaṃ ākāraṃ gaṇhāti.
atk-s0516a:685_1: Etaṃ puggalaṃ satikavāṭena cakkhundriyaṃ asaṃvutaṃ apihitacakkhudvāraṃ hutvā viharantaṃ ete abhijjhādayo dhammā anvāssaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0516a:685_2: Tassa saṃvarāya na paṭipajjatīti tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāya na paṭipajjati.
atk-s0516a:686_0: Tattha kiñcāpi cakkhundriye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā natthi.
atk-s0516a:686_1: Na hi cakkhupasādaṃ nissāya sati vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0516a:686_2: api ca yadā rūpārammaṇaṃ cakkhussa āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0516a:686_3: tadā bhavaṅge dvikkhattuṃ uppajjitvā niruddhe kiriyamanodhātu āvajjanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0516a:686_4: tato cakkhuviññāṇaṃ dassanakiccaṃ tato vipākamanodhātu sampaṭicchanakiccaṃ tato vipākāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu
atk-s0516a:686_5: santīraṇakiccaṃ tato kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu voṭṭhapanakiccaṃ sādhayamānā uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
atk-s0516a:686_8: na āvajjanādīnaṃ aññatarasamaye saṃvaro vā asaṃvaro vā atthi,
atk-s0516a:686_9: javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṃ vā muṭṭhassaccaṃ vā aññāṇaṃ vā akkhanti vā kosajjaṃ vā uppajjati,
atk-s0516a:686_11: Evaṃ honto pana so cakkhundriye asaṃvaroti vuccati. Kasmā?
atk-s0516a:686_12: Yasmā tasmiṃ sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0516a:686_14: Yathā nagare catūsu dvāresu asaṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharadvārakoṭṭhakagabbhādayo susaṃvutā,
atk-s0516a:686_15: tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ arakkhitaṃ agopitameva hoti.
atk-s0516a:686_18: Evameva javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipīti.
atk-s0516a:687_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā na nimittaggāhī hotītiādīsu na nimittaggāhī hotīti chandarāgavasena vuttappakāraṃ nimittaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0516a:687_2: Yathā ca heṭṭhā “javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṃ asaṃvare sati dvārampi aguttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipī”ti vuttaṃ,
atk-s0516a:687_3: evamidha tasmiṃ sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0516a:687_5: Yathā nagaradvāresu saṃvutesu kiñcāpi antogharādayo asaṃvutā honti.
atk-s0516a:687_6: Tathāpi antonagare sabbaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ surakkhitaṃ sugopitameva hoti.
atk-s0516a:687_8: Evameva javane sīlādīsu uppannesu dvārampi guttaṃ hoti bhavaṅgampi āvajjanādīni vīthicittānipi.
atk-s0516a:687_9: Tasmā javanakkhaṇe uppajjamānopi cakkhundriye saṃvaroti vutto.
atk-s0516a:688_0: Avassutapariyāyañcāti kilesehi tintakāraṇañca. Anavassutapariyāyañcāti kilesehi atintakāraṇañca.
atk-s0516a:692_1: Dasame kāsāyavattho abhinikkhamitvāti imassa pādassa gehā abhinikkhamitvā kāsāyavattho hutvāti evamattho veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:692_2: Sesaṃ vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritanti.
atk-s0516a:696_8: Yathā vā pubbe uyyāne rasesu gedhakaraṇalolo hutvā aññaposī āsiṃ,
atk-s0516a:696_9: evaṃ ahutvā yāya taṇhāya lolo hutvā rasesu gedhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0516a:696_10: taṃ taṇhaṃ hitvā āyatiṃ taṇhāmūlakassa aññassa attabhāvassa anibbattanena anaññaposīti dasseti.
atk-s0516a:696_14: gharapaṭipāṭiṃ achaḍḍetvā aḍḍhakulañca daliddakulañca nirantaraṃ piṇḍāya pavisamānoti attho.
atk-s0516a:696_15: Kule kule appaṭibaddhacittoti khattiyakulādīsu yattha katthaci kilesavasena alaggacitto,
atk-s0516a:698_3: Tāni pana yasmā abbhādayo viya candaṃ sūriyaṃ vā ceto āvaranti,
atk-s0516a:698_5: Tāni upacārena vā appanāya vā pahāya.
atk-s0516a:698_6: Upakkileseti upagamma cittaṃ vibādhente akusale dhamme,
atk-s0516a:698_11: Evaṃ samathavipassanāsampanno paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhinissayassa pahīnattā anissito.
atk-s0516a:698_14: Sineho eva hi guṇapaṭipakkhato sinehadosoti vutto.
atk-s0516a:701_5: kāraṃ parato netvā “somanassaṃ domanassañca vipiṭṭhikatvāna pubbevā”ti adhikāro.
atk-s0516a:701_13: “paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharati etthuppannaṃ dukkhindriyaṃ aparisesaṃ nirujjhatī”tiādi.
atk-s0516a:701_15: Parato pubbevāti tīsu paṭhamajjhānadīsu dukkhadomanassasukhāni vipiṭṭhikatvā ettheva ca catutthajjhāne
atk-s0516a:701_16: somanassaṃ vipiṭṭhikatvā imāya paṭipadāya laddhānupekkhaṃ samathaṃ visuddhaṃ eko care iti.
atk-s0516a:703_6: Alīnacittoti etena vīriyupatthambhānaṃ cittacetasikānaṃ alīnataṃ dasseti.
atk-s0516a:703_8: Daḷhanikkamoti etena “kāmaṃ taco ca nhāru cā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ padahanavīriyaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0516a:703_9: Yaṃ taṃ anupubbasikkhādīsu padahanto “kāyena ceva paramatthasaccaṃ sacchikaroti,
atk-s0516a:703_10: paññāya ca naṃ ativijjha passatī”ti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:703_14: tasmā taṃsamaṅgīpuggalopi daḷho nikkamo assāti “daḷhanikkamo”ti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:703_15: Thāmabalūpapannoti maggakkhaṇe kāyathāmena ñāṇabalena ca upapanno.
atk-s0516a:703_16: Atha vā thāmabhūtena balena upapannoti thāmabalūpapanno,
atk-s0516a:703_18: Etena tassa vīriyassa vipassanāñāṇasampayogaṃ dīpento yoniso padahanabhāvaṃ sādheti.
atk-s0516a:705_1: Pañcame paṭisallānanti tehi tehi sattasaṅkhārehi paṭinivattitvā sallīnaṃ,
atk-s0516a:705_3: Jhānanti paccanīkajhāpanato ārammaṇalakkhaṇūpanijjhānato ca cittaviveko vuccati.
atk-s0516a:705_4: Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo nīvaraṇādipaccanīkajhāpanato kasiṇādiārammaṇūpanijjhānato ca “jhāna”nti vuccati.
atk-s0516a:705_7: Evametaṃ paṭisallānañca jhānañca ariñcamānoti ajahamāno anissajjamāno.
atk-s0516a:705_10: Anudhammacārīti te dhamme ārabbha pavattamānena anugataṃ vipassanādhammaṃ caramāno.
atk-s0516a:705_11: Atha vā dhammesūti ettha dhammāti nava lokuttaradhammā,
atk-s0516a:705_14: Tattha “dhammānaṃ niccaṃ anudhammacārī”ti vattabbe gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ vibhattibyattayena “dhammesū”ti vuttaṃ siyā.
atk-s0516a:705_15: Ādīnavaṃ sammasitā bhavesūti tāya anudhammacāritāsaṅkhātāya vipassanāya aniccākārādidosaṃ tīsu bhavesu
atk-s0516a:705_16: samanupassanto evaṃ imāya kāyavivekacittavivekaṃ ariñcamāno sikhāppattavipassanāsaṅkhātāya paṭipadāya
atk-s0516a:705_17: adhigatoti vattabbo eko careti evaṃ yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0516a:707_5: Atha vā aneḷo ca amūgo ca,
atk-s0516a:707_14: Evametehi appamādādīhi samannāgato niyāmasampāpakena padhānena padhānavā,
atk-s0516a:707_17: Arahā hi puna saṅkhātabbābhāvato “saṅkhātadhammo”ti vuccati. Yathāha –
atk-s0516a:709_8: Tesu yo koci vāto yaṃ kiñci padumaṃ vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0516a:709_11: sopi diṭṭhisampayuttena vā diṭṭhivippayuttena vā lobhena hoti,
atk-s0516a:709_13: Sajjanaṃ pana tattha upaparikkhāvirahitassa mohena hoti,
atk-s0516a:709_17: Tasmā samathena attasinehaṃ pahāya sīho viya saddesu aniccadukkhādīsuasantasanto,
atk-s0516a:709_18: vipassanāya mohaṃ pahāya vātova jālamhi khandhāyatanādīsu asajjamāno,
atk-s0516a:710_2: vipassanā paññāti evaṃ tesu dvīsu dhammesu siddhesu tayopi khandhā siddhā honti.
atk-s0516a:710_4: so sīhova saddhesu āghātavatthūsu akujjhitukāmatāya na santasati,
atk-s0516a:710_5: paññākkhandhena paṭividdhasabhāvo vātova jālamhi khandhādidhammabhede na sajjati,
atk-s0516a:710_6: samādhikkhandhena vītarāgo padumaṃva toyena rāgena na lippati.
atk-s0516a:710_7: Evaṃ samathavipassanāhi sīlasamādhipaññākkhandhehi ca yathāsambhavaṃ avijjātaṇhānaṃ,
atk-s0516a:710_8: tiṇṇañca akusalamūlānaṃ pahānavasena asantasanto asajjamāno alippamāno ca veditabbo.
atk-s0516a:712_1: Aṭṭhame sahanā ca hananā ca sīghajavattā ca sīho.
atk-s0516a:712_4: Pasayha abhibhuyyāti ubhayaṃ cārīsaddena saha yojetabbaṃ pasayhacārī abhibhuyyacārīti.
atk-s0516a:712_5: Tattha pasayha niggayha pavāhetvā caraṇena pasayhacārī.
atk-s0516a:712_9: Tattha sace koci vadeyya “kiṃ pasayha abhibhuyyacārī”ti.
atk-s0516a:712_10: Tato migānanti sāmivacanaṃ upayogatthe katvā “mige pasayha abhibhuyyacārī”ti paṭivattabbaṃ.
atk-s0516a:712_13: Sesaṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva sakkā jānitunti na vitthāritaṃ.
atk-s0516a:714_1: Navame “sabbe sattā sukhitā bhavantū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhūpanayanakāmatā mettā.
atk-s0516a:714_2: “Aho vata imamhā dukkhā vimucceyyu”ntiādinā nayena ahitadukkhāpanayanakāmatā karuṇā.
atk-s0516a:714_4: modanti sādhu suṭṭhū”tiādinā nayena hitasukhāvippayogakāmatā muditā.
atk-s0516a:714_6: Gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ pana uppaṭipāṭiyā mettaṃ vatvā upekkhā vuttā,
atk-s0516a:715_2: Kāleti mettaṃ āsevitvā tato vuṭṭhāya karuṇaṃ,
atk-s0516a:715_4: tato itarato vā nippītikajjhānato vuṭṭhāya upekkhaṃ āsevamānova “kāle āsevamāno”ti vuccati,
atk-s0516a:715_6: Sabbena lokena avirujjhamānoti dasasu disāsu sabbena sattalokena avirujjhamāno.
atk-s0516a:717_2: tāni ca tena tena maggena sandālayitvāna.
atk-s0516a:717_3: Asantasaṃ jīvitasaṅkhayamhīti jīvitasaṅkhayo vuccati cuticittassa paribhedo,
atk-s0516a:717_5: Ettāvatā saupādisesanibbānadhātuṃ attano dassetvā gāthāpariyosāne anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyīti.
atk-s0516a:719_7: Nikkāraṇā dullabhā ajja mittāti “ito kiñci lacchāmā”ti evaṃ attapaṭilābhakāraṇena nikkāraṇā, kevalaṃ –
atk-s0516a:720_0: “Upakāro ca yo mitto, sukhe dukkhe ca yo sakhā;
atk-s0516a:721_0: Atthakkhāyī ca yo mitto, yo ca mittānukampako”ti. –
atk-s0516a:722_0: Evaṃ vuttena ariyena mittabhāvena samannāgatā dullabhā ajja mittā.
atk-s0516a:732_0: Yo tassa dakkhiṇe bhāge, mahāvihāro patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0516a:733_0: Yo tassa tilako bhūto, mahāthūpo siluccayo;
atk-s0516a:734_0: Yaṃ tassa pacchime bhāge, lekho kathikasaññito.
atk-s0516a:751_0: Ānuṭṭhubhena assā, chando baddhena gaṇiyamānā tu;
atk-s0516a:754_0: Puññaṃ imaṃ racayatā, yaṃ pattamanappakaṃ vipulaṃ.
